summary: Tag the cities you visited on your trips and create your own personal travel map
developerAddress:
Turbinenstrasse 40
8005 Zürich
SWITZERLAND
recentChanges:
- Added fullscreen mode for maps
- Improvements and bugfixes
comments: I absolutely love how intuitive the app is, I bought the Pro version to get rid of the advertisements, and now I'm very happy. One note, however, I couldn't find a report function. Barrow, Alaska changed its name back to Utqiagvik, and I think it's troubling that there is no functionality to report this to the app developers. Please add this function to future updates, thank you.

Very disappointed the premium unlocks nothing of value in the app and you still have at least a 4 good investment to use the features most would use. What's missing is the data needed to record against all the popular locations. Most apps, you pay for Pro, you get all the features. This app, you pay for Pro - which isn't cheap as apps go - and you then still have at least double this cost to enable the recording of the most popular places.

I spent the better part of the evening feeling cool by checking off all the places I've been to. Obviously not all are available. Fair enough, I understand you can upgrade to get more features. But what drive me nuts are the obnoxious ads. We're not talking about a banner but a full screen ad. There's a timer to let you know when there are due, roughly every 5 minutes. So maybe if you don't stay long enough having fun like me, you might not be as annoyed. Not for me : deal breaker, unistalling.
Amazingly easy to use and cheap to buy pro version,,, definitely recommend it
Unable to add many places even if the city can be seen on the map

title: trivago: Compare hotel prices
description:
Discover the great deals, compare hotel prices & save money on your next holiday or trip –  get savings when you hotel search with trivago! 

Find hotels for your holiday or business trip, discover a last minute city break or a winter sun weekend deal. With more than a million hotels to choose from and hundreds of worldwide booking sites to compare, plan your next trip stress-free with the world’s famous hotel and travel app! 

Compare hotels & find your ideal hotel at great price before you book. Discover hotels and great deals with trivago!

Hotel Search and Save Money: Top 5 Reasons to Download trivago:
1. Compare hotels and find rooms from hundreds of bookings sites worldwide. 
2. Discover hotels for great prices, find travel discounts, deals & savings from hotels worldwide  so you can travel cheaply.
3. Compare hotel prices to find rooms near attractions – search with your budget in mind by setting a trip itinerary for that last minute getaway.
4. Save money on vacation and travel sites so you can book your ideal hotel at your convenience.
5. Hotel search with the trivago Rating Index® – see the combined online ratings of all available hotel review scores so you feel confident before you book.

Find hotels, motels or B&B’s and compare prices across all the top bookings sites including Expedia, Hotels.com, Holidaycheck, ebookers, AlphaRooms, LateRooms, Travelrepublic, Amoma.com, Booking.com, Priceline, HotelTonight and more.

Find rooms in hotels near well-known sights and set a maximum price. Keep your hotel search within budget and easily compare hotels and search by both location and price. Discover hotels, savings & travel discounts for your cheap last minute trip.

Compare hotel prices & travel discounts, plan your trip with confidence and save money while on vacation. Our massive workforce will always find the great deals on hotel prices to make your next vacation stress-free.

Find hotels with one of the world’s best travel app’s:
- The Guardian lists trivago among the “10 best money-saving apps.”
- Tech Times calls trivago one of the “must have apps for frequent travelers.”
-  Lifehacker lists trivago among the “best price-comparison apps you need to download.”

Download trivago to discover hotels and compare prices for great deals. Save money and plan for future holiday bookings while on the go!

recentChanges: Thanks for using the trivago app. We always take our users' reviews into consideration as we make improvements, so be sure to let us know what you think. From now on, you can expect fixed monthly releases based on what we learn from you. Just go to your settings and enable automatic updates.
comments: Enable Install on External Drive. Storage is tight on my Android phone. Many apps allow installs on external drives. They get to stay on my phone. Trivago had to be removed. :( PS - your support site is kinda useless. Had to lower my rating due to your generic response.
Very useful, contains all the info you want, offers comparison function of hotels and prices. Easy to interrogate - good user interface.
I like things simple, this app let's me search hotels, compare and book. Perfect.
Great app for finding best prices for weekend getaways and vacations. I love you this app ...
Tribago is the best app to know and comparero the hotel price at the same location on the spot. Usable app for the travel lovers

title: Travel Budget - Track Expenses with TravelSpend
description:
TravelSpend makes it incredibly easy to keep track of your travel expenses and manage your budget. It's a free and well designed app packed with useful features for travelers.

Made for travelers 🌍
Specifically designed for travelers. No internet connection required.

Stick to your budget 💰
The app will help you keep track of your travel budget and your expenses.

Don't worry about currencies 💱
You can add expenses in any currency. They will automatically be converted to your home currency.

Gain insights from your spending 📊
Your spending data will be visualized. You'll be able to analyze your spending so you can stick to your budget.

Track costs with fellow travelers 👫  (Premium feature)
Share trips with fellow travelers to keep track of your expenses together and split costs.

Export your data 🗄 (Premium feature)
You can export your spending data to a csv file at any time.

recentChanges:
We fixed a small issue that sometimes caused amounts in certain currencies to display incorrectly. 💱
Any questions or problems? Email us: info@travel-spend.com
comments: Very good app, but missing one feature. There isn't cost split option if you are travelling not alone. For example, traveller 1 paid for meal for himself, traveller 2 and 3, while traveller 4 was not eating. It is really good app and I use it all the time, since most of the time I travel alone, but if I have someone else with me - I need to use different app. One day when you fix it - you will be the best in the market :)

Used it to track my expense for my New York trip last Christmas and it was very easy to use and helped a lot in terms of keeping me on budget. My only dislike is not being able to export the data unless a premium member. Nonetheless a great app highly recommend if you're travelling on a tight budget or you just wanna see how you spent money

I am using the paid version of this and have found it useful, but one thing is frustrating me. I added a category and want to change the icon assigned, but can find no way to do that, or even delete the category I added and re-add it correctly. UPDATE: Thank you very much for your prompt reply. I'm sorry I am so late in letting you know that your suggestion worked perfectly and I have updated my rating from 4 to 5 stars!

I loved using this app to track my spending while travelling. It is easy to use and puts the money in different categories and then allows you to view the break down of your spending. It really makes me accountable when spending abroad and has helped me save money. I love that you can make new trips and set a total budget that automatically sets a daily budget that is then attainable. The free version does have some pop up ads but well worth it to have such a great app for free! Highly recommend

Great App. I am using their free version. And I am 100% satisfied with this app. I make positive impact. And if you are a budget traveller then it is best app for you. To write your day to day expenses. Automatic total calculation helps to find your average daily expense.

title: Sygic Travel Maps Offline & Trip Planner
description:
Discover things to do anywhere you go. Plan detailed trip itineraries. Get around with useful travel guides. An ultimate all-in-one app for every traveler.

ADVANCED TRIP PLANNER
Build a complete day-to-day itinerary for your trip with an easy-to-use trip planner. See estimated travel times and walking distances and keep realistic plans. Invite your friends to collaborate on your trips.

WORLDWIDE OFFLINE MAPS
Buy Sygic Travel Premium to use the app without any internet connection, including unlimited offline maps download.

50 MILLION PLACES
Sights, museums, parks, cafés, restaurants, hotels, beaches, waterfalls, caves or even bird observatories. Whether you're a tourist up to sightseeing, out on a shopping trip or a romantic weekend getaway, we've got you covered.

PHOTOS, DESCRIPTIONS, WIKIPEDIA
Popular places come with descriptions, photos, opening hours, admission fees, links and additional data written by professional travel editors or sourced from Wikipedia and other databases.

360° VIDEOS
Take a look around top sights in exclusive 360° videos. Over 500 professional videos from Prague, Barcelona, Valencia, Madrid, Granada, Seville, Marrakech, Gran Canaria, Porto, Lisbon, Athens, Istanbul, Cairo, Tel Aviv, Jerusalem, Bethlehem and Vienna. 360° videos also support Cardboard.

MAPS DESIGNED FOR TRAVELERS
Detailed maps based on OpenStreetMap.org data adjusted for walking and exploring your destination. Built-in search and GPS-based walking directions and tight integration with the Sygic GPS Navigation.

POWERFUL SEARCH AND FILTERS
Find any place by name or address. Use filters to show attractions, museums, shopping malls, restaurants, bars down to art galleries featuring Van Gogh paintings.

TOURS AND ACTIVITIES
Find the best sightseeing tours, cruises, or even local cuisine cooking classes. Buy skip-the-line tickets to top attractions straight from the app.

ACCOMMODATION
Find a hotel, hostel, apartment or b&b. Add it to your trip and see it in your daily itinerary including travel times. Book your accommodation with booking.com straight from the app.

USE ON ALL DEVICES
Your trips will sync automatically between all your devices and our web planner available at https://maps.sygic.com

Using Google Trips? Beware that the trip planning app will be retired on August 5, 2019. Sygic Travel is a great alternative to consider.

GET IN TOUCH WITH US
Check out our online travel maps at https://maps.sygic.com
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SygicTravel
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SygicTravel/
Contact our support team: team@travel.sygic.com
descriptionHTML:
Discover things to do anywhere you go. Plan detailed trip itineraries. Get around with useful travel guides. An ultimate all-in-one app for every traveler.

ADVANCED TRIP PLANNER
Build a complete day-to-day itinerary for your trip with an easy-to-use trip planner. See estimated travel times and walking distances and keep realistic plans. Invite your friends to collaborate on your trips.

WORLDWIDE OFFLINE MAPS
Buy Sygic Travel Premium to use the app without any internet connection, including unlimited offline maps download.

50 MILLION PLACES
Sights, museums, parks, cafés, restaurants, hotels, beaches, waterfalls, caves or even bird observatories. Whether you're a tourist up to sightseeing, out on a shopping trip or a romantic weekend getaway, we've got you covered.

PHOTOS, DESCRIPTIONS, WIKIPEDIA
Popular places come with descriptions, photos, opening hours, admission fees, links and additional data written by professional travel editors or sourced from Wikipedia and other databases.

360° VIDEOS
Take a look around top sights in exclusive 360° videos. Over 500 professional videos from Prague, Barcelona, Valencia, Madrid, Granada, Seville, Marrakech, Gran Canaria, Porto, Lisbon, Athens, Istanbul, Cairo, Tel Aviv, Jerusalem, Bethlehem and Vienna. 360° videos also support Cardboard.

MAPS DESIGNED FOR TRAVELERS
Detailed maps based on OpenStreetMap.org data adjusted for walking and exploring your destination. Built-in search and GPS-based walking directions and tight integration with the Sygic GPS Navigation.

POWERFUL SEARCH AND FILTERS
Find any place by name or address. Use filters to show attractions, museums, shopping malls, restaurants, bars down to art galleries featuring Van Gogh paintings.

TOURS AND ACTIVITIES
Find the best sightseeing tours, cruises, or even local cuisine cooking classes. Buy skip-the-line tickets to top attractions straight from the app.

ACCOMMODATION
Find a hotel, hostel, apartment or b&b. Add it to your trip and see it in your daily itinerary including travel times. Book your accommodation with booking.com straight from the app.

USE ON ALL DEVICES
Your trips will sync automatically between all your devices and our web planner available at https://maps.sygic.com

Using Google Trips? Beware that the trip planning app will be retired on August 5, 2019. Sygic Travel is a great alternative to consider.

GET IN TOUCH WITH US
Check out our online travel maps at https://maps.sygic.com
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SygicTravel
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SygicTravel/
Contact our support team: team@travel.sygic.com
summary: Worldwide offline travel maps with a travel guide and a built-in trip planner.
developerAddress:
Mlynske Nivy 16
82109 Bratislava
Slovensko
recentChanges:
Updated translations and a few small improvements.

Do you enjoy Sygic Travel? Please help others discover it. Rating it in Google Play means a lot. Your feedback is also much appreciated. Thanks!
comments: Complements well with the web version. In fact, it's best to plan your trip in front of the PC and use this app to view/modify your trip while traveling. That said, the UI could use some improvements

First impressions planning a RV trip (FREE): Pros: Most destinations were listed and easily added to my trip. Itinerary relatively easy to edit. Places easy to add. Cons: No satellite, terrain, etc. views on maps. Maps not current for navigation...a major highway near me doesn't show completion...that's inexcusable. Weather forecast was COMPLETELY inaccurate... Unable to download. No easy NAVIGATE option from the itinerary...have to go deeper. This app has potential, but is really basic.

I'm currently enjoying how easier it makes to plan a trip. The only thing I think is missing is a section to calculate expenses and maybe time indicators for each place added in a day. Also integrations with Omio and Airbnb

I was interested in sygic travel Maps offline & trip planner, but after trying out the free ones, I found that many stores names were not on the map, even when searching they were not available, and sadly my place of residence address were not on the maps..malaysia

Great app to plan any trip, by allowing you to lay out the sites you want to see, places you want to go, and seeing on a map how close/ far apart. This lets you plan your day in the most effecient sequence - LOVE it.

title: Airbnb
description:
Unforgettable travel experiences start with Airbnb. Find travel adventures and new places to go far away or near to you, and access vacation home rentals, new experiences, and places to visit all around the world. Book everything for your trip, or start earning money as a host. 

BOOK TRAVEL EXPERIENCES
Go on local experiences led by native experts, whether it’s for multiple days or just an afternoon. Explore Seoul's underground music scene, hunt for truffles in a Tuscan forest, or give back to the community with a social impact experience.

BOOK VACATION HOMES
Choose from over 6 million vacation home rentals across 191+ countries. Search by price, neighborhood, amenities, and more.

POPULAR DESTINATIONS
Experience the beautiful sights & find local guides for the perfect vacation:
• Rio – Explore the birthplace of Samba or hang glide over the sights
• Paris – Find your fill in some of the best culinary tours and museums
• Barcelona – Discover the cities beauty with guided walking tours

For travelers: 
• Book vacation home rentals and travel experiences for your next solo journey, family vacation, or business trip
• Search for last minute travel accommodations or long term rentals
• Save your favorite rental homes, experiences, and places—and invite friends and family to plan the trip with you
• Add experiences and events to your itinerary
• Message your host and get directions to your home

For hosts:
• Share your extra space or lead experiences that showcase what makes your city great
• Update your listing and calendar availability
• Share what’s special about your neighborhood with a host guidebook
• Message guests and manage their reservations

summary: Find the perfect vacation rental, live like a local, discover new experiences.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Spam spam spam. I have never seen an app that feels the need to spam both your sms, push and email notifications by default for opportunities for bookings. This is plain marketing manipulation. Be better guys. Manufacturers are trying to get people to look at their phones less and now you're pulling them in with every single means possible. Do better!

The app is okay I guess, but customer service is horrible. I called in understanding I would have to stay on hold to talk to a representative but after not recieving any wait times and completing the same automated loop twice it hung up on me. This happened two times. If you are looking for a company that cares about customer service this isn't the one.

I travel for work & have used ABB over the past year. Pros: ABB is global. It is THEE App to use for work travel & vacationing. It is fairly easy to use, once you learn how to navigate the program. Cons: I don't like that you cannot book multiple reservations at one time, each one a separate transaction. And that availability is not displayed in real time. Also messages don't always display right away. Consumer Advice: always use the "Instant Book" feature.

Great app, easy to use, just with a few quirks. 1) The ratings are shown rounded to the nearest 0.5 so you often think they are more highly rated than they are (this definitely applies to your Saved lists, not sure elsewhere). 2) There isn't a way to change your payment methods unless you are about to book a place (or at least I couldn't find it). 3) When looking at a saved list alongside someone else (both using the app), we saw different prices - mine included service charge; his didnt.

It's a great service really. I understand they are likely to take the blame for bad services provided by hosts which is unfair but I had one issue with the App company itself which I feel should be addressed. If you do not use the App for a long time and forget your password, the recovery and reactivation process is overkill. It's good to have tight security, but in my situation, it worked against me. How can some one abroad auenticate with their (likely) native phone? Security question, plz!

title: PackPoint travel packing list
description:
Google Play Editor's Choice Award Winner

As Featured In The Washington Post, BBC, LA Times, CNN, Lifehacker, Fast Company's Co.DESIGN, and The Next Web
"A Travel App That Practically Packs Your Bags For You"

Never Forget Your ______ Again!

PackPoint is a free travel packing list organizer and packing planner for serious travel pros. PackPoint will help you organize what you need to pack in your luggage and suitcase based on length of travel, weather at your destination, and any activities planned during your trip.

Once your packing list is built and organized, PackPoint will save it for you, and then you can choose to share it with your friends and family in case they need help packing too.

Punch in the city you're going to travel to, the departure date, and the number of nights you'll be staying there.  

PackPoint will organize a packing list and luggage checklist for your luggage that takes into account:
- Business or Leisure travel
- Activities you plan on doing
- What you need for an international trip
- Warm weather clothes
- Cold weather clothes
- An umbrella if the forecast calls for rain
- If you're willing to repeat wearing basics like shirts and pants
- If you will have access to laundry facilities

Some expert packing organizer user tips:
- Check out the Customize menu within PackPoint for PackPoint's Premium features
- Connect PackPoint to TripIt and create your packing lists automatically!
- Put the PackPoint widget on your home screen
- Swipe to remove packing list items
- Tap to the right of each item to change its quantity
- Pack smart to avoid airline luggage overage fees
- Create a luggage checklist now, and then edit it later as you pack

Have a feature request or feedback?
Visit http://ideas.packpnt.com or e-mail info@packpnt.com

Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/packpoint
Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/packpnt @packpnt

summary: A packing list app that helps you remember what to pack for a trip 📷🎒🌍☀️🛎️💼
developerAddress:
8605 Santa Monica Blvd
Los Angeles, CA 90069
recentChanges: Minor bug fixes
comments: No way to edit a trip date. unintuitive UI - not clear what greyed out items mean, whether checked or not. Not clear how to bring back previously swiped items. Previous trips are archived and effectively dead. You can't copy them as a basis for a similar trip. I think I'll stick with ColorNote.

I tried this one because it has the highest rating (4.7) and is the editor's choice. I am uninstalling it because you can not edit the travel dates and more importantly you can not edit the preset list you are provided with based on the categories you choose. All the extra items I don't need is distracting and time consuming which I don't need as a last minute packer! I am using PackKing instead, which has more flexibility regarding the concerns discussed above.

Gets the job done. Reviews the destination weather, length of stay, purpose of travel, special activities and gives packing suggestions. Allows one to add additional items. Not thoroughly personalized but I use it every time I pack.
It makes my travel easier every time I use it. Its great because along with being easy to use , it also reminds me to pack small stuff that I usually forget about.
This is awesome, I always struggle with what to take, now I have an automatic list that gives great ideas. Some things I will alter but many things I will take.

title: Couchsurfing Travel App
description:
Couchsurfing is the best way to stay with locals, make lifelong travel friends, or host travelers coming to your hometown. Over 14 million travel enthusiasts use Couchsurfing in more than 230,000 cities around the world.

Find hosts in your next destination
Browse the millions of local hosts offering a place to stay in thousands of cities around the globe

Make New Friends
See who's nearby and wants to meet up by becoming available on Couchsurfing Hangouts! Also check out the thousands of events planned by Couchsurfers in your hometown or upcoming travel destination.

Meet Travelers Without Traveling
Can’t travel right now? Host or meet up with incoming travelers coming to your city

And More
• Plan your next trip
• Share photos from your travel adventures

Couchsurfing is the best way to stay with locals, make lifelong travel friends, or host travelers coming to your hometown. Over 14 million travel enthusiasts use Couchsurfing in more than 230,000 cities around the world.

summary: "A fantastic and unique way to make friends with people from around the world "
recentChanges: • Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: It's very very helpful application guys, it helps you to know more people and get new friends also it helps you finding your hosts all over the world i recommend it and give it 5 stars

Editing my previous review. I haven't used this app for long, but recently have discovered a massive glitch. It's tedious to make profile changes, cos the changes don't get properly saved. I have shifted to another place, literally 1000 kms away in another country, and yet I cannot update my home address. No matter what, the changes are "saved" but they are never "stored" and hence jump back to the previous address almost immediately.

Couchsurfing really has a great potential to have an amazing positive impact on the way you travel and maybe even see life. As long as you keep one thing in mind: at the start it is frustrating that you won't get anywhere without having reviews and being verified. But it is free to get verified if you host someone. Once you have been verified and gotten a review it will be easy to find a couch. It really makes sense actually as it is supposed to be a two way system.

I want to edit my review and dis-rate the app now because a big problem I have noticed with this app which I don't receive any notification shows that I received a message from someone unless I go to my inbox and check myself and which can be after so many days because I don't keep in my mind that I have to check my inbox all the time because it has to be automatically. According to me, it's a huge mistake and am very sure that all the people are facing the same problem. Hope you work on it..!!

I get no notifications at all. My changed in the profile are not getting updated and saved. I can not upload more than one picture for some weird reason. Everytime I go to a screen I get this notification of agreeing to share data- how many times do I really need to tap on that? The app is too slow, it takes forever to load.

title: Polarsteps - Travel Tracker
description:
Automatically track your route and places you've visited while you are traveling. Just carry your phone in your pocket and the app creates your own beautiful travel journal.

Once connected to the internet, your travel routes, locations and photos are seamlessly transferred to your personal traveler profile, where your route is plotted on a colourful world map that can easily be shared with friends and family.

PRAISE FOR POLARSTEPS

"Polarsteps helps you track and share your journeys in an easy and visually appealing way." - The Next Web

"There are many apps that you can use to record different moments from your travels, but none are as all-inclusive and easy to use as Polarsteps." - Refinery29

"Polarsteps replaces your travel journal, making it easier and more beautiful." - National Geographic

KEY FEATURES

■ Easily track your travels
Automatically keep track of your route and places you’ve visited without taking your phone from your pocket.

■ Ride along with your friends
Follow your family and friends on their trips and feel like you're in the passenger seat.

■ Get an instant photo album
Generate a beautiful printed photo album that includes your travel stats and route.

■ Minimal battery consumption
Our Travel Tracker uses very little battery because we use smart technology to determine your location.

■ Full privacy control
Log your trips privately, share them with friends and family at home or inspire the rest of the world!

■ Tracking works offline
Track your entire route without being connected to the internet. The app automatically synchronizes when you're back online.

COMMUNITY
Follow us on Instagram, Facebook & Twitter for the latest app updates and travel inspiration.

www.instagram.com/polarsteps
www.facebook.com/polarsteps
www.twitter.com/polarsteps

PROBLEMS? FEEDBACK?
The more you tell us, the better the app gets. Please send your feedback to support@polarsteps.com or on Facebook: www.facebook.com/polarsteps.

PERMISSIONS
Your privacy is really important to us. We only ask for the permissions we need for the app to serve at its best as your personal travel journal app / travel diary app / travel blog app.


If you have any more questions get in touch with us - see the help section.

summary: Automatically track your route and places you visit while traveling.
recentChanges: We improved video performance, and we gave the app some tender lovin’ care. If you notice anything off, drop us a note to support@polarsteps.com. We’re listening!
comments: There aren't a lot of good apps out there for showing where you've been in a step-by-step process AND allowing you to post a lot of pics AND allowing you to tell your story. After a bad experience with an app that kept deleting my hard work, I downloaded a bunch of new ones and this is the only one I kept. It isn't perfect. Its tracking often stopped following me, so I had to enter a bunch of locations and times by hand. Suggestions for steps aren't great either. But uploading pics is intuitive.

Downloaded the app on my 2 phones - one doesn't sync with the other after making changes. I have now one account on two handsets with different contents. I still think it's a good application and rate it highly. UPDATE: Very nice for the app authors to contact me when the fix was found. Now changing from 4☆☆☆☆ to the ultimate 5☆☆☆☆☆! Highly recommended! The more you populate your account with your travels, the more you will like it!

Such a cool idea! I've made 3 trips with it far with the 3rd being over 5500 miles trip across U.S. and hundreds of pictures and vidoes. Still on 3rd trip and continuing to add. Originally Got app for the travel tracker...it works great. If your traveling long distances or taking a vacation, I would highly suggest.

Really like the app: tracks you, reminds you to place a step and keeps you close to people at home. However it can do with some improvements: being able to like and reply to single comments (like in fb/insta) would be great and editing pictures in the app.

Really nice way to record your trips and for your family and friends to keep up with where in the world you are. You can add photos and a description of each place you visited and it creates a nice little map of the route you took.

title: Hotels.com: Book hotels, vacation rentals and more
description:
Love to travel? From cheap hotels to vacation rentals, Hotels.com has the best travel app to book your summer vacation resort, business trip hotel, or last minute room for tonight. 

EASILY FIND THE PERFECT STAY FOR YOUR TRIP
• We do more than just hotels! Book vacation rentals, apartments, luxury resorts, B&Bs, motels, hostels and, yes, hotels - from cheap rooms to unique boutiques!
• Search and compare travel deals and hotel prices before making your reservation 
• Make a reservation and book your travel in a few easy taps

GET LAST-MINUTE TRAVEL DEALS 
• Get instant savings on reservations with Secret Prices
• Save 5%* on selected hotel bookings and vacation rentals when you book on the app with code MOB5 
• Traveling tonight? Get last minute travel deals with Tonight’s Local Deals
• Find flash sales on your last minute holiday escapes
• Save on your trip with last minute travel deals

GET REWARDED WHEN BOOKING WITH HOTELS.COM
• Collect 10 nights and get 1 reward night** with Hotels.com® Rewards
• Redeem your reward nights just about anywhere: from major hotel chains and beach resorts to villas, apartments and more

EASY RESERVATION & BOOKING
• Save payment details for fast booking on your next trip 
• Get instant notifications to confirm your booking

AND MORE ON TRIP
• Manage your booking and reservation details, even offline 
• Plan your upcoming trip or vacation with in-app Travel Guides   

**The maximum value of your reward night is the average daily rate of your ten nights. Your reward night does not include taxes and fees. 

*MOB5 T&Cs: Enter coupon to get 5% off your booking at a participating Best Price Guarantee hotel when you book your holiday on the Hotels.com app. You can’t collect or redeem Rewards nights when you use this coupon. You must pay for your stay when you make the reservation. This coupon can’t be used for package bookings / reservations (e.g. with flights). Go to http://www.hotels.com/page/hotel-exclusions/ for a list of non-participating hotels. There’s a limit of one coupon per booking. It can be combined with discounted prices on Hotels.com but cannot be used with any other promotion on Hotels.com. Usual booking terms and conditions apply (see hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html) and all bookings are subject to availability. Hotels.com is the promoter of this offer. 

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By downloading our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html.

summary: Fast and easy booking! Last minute travel deals for the perfect place to stay.
recentChanges:
Thanks for using Hotels.com!

If you love to travel, you'll love our app. We're working hard to make the Hotels.com app the most rewarding place to book a stay. This update includes performance enhancements and bug fixes—so it's even easier to find the perfect place to stay for your next trip.
comments: I know there is the Covid-19 virus going around, and of course the phones are busy, but why doesn't the app or the website let me cancel online? I have been trying since 8 am and I keep getting this error message: This is a new reservation and is currently in progress, please try again after 30 minutes if you wish to cancel. I made this reservation 2 weeks ago. It's now 4 pm and I have until 6 pm or the hotel charges me, non refundable. Fun? No. Can I give 0 stars?

The actual act of reserving rooms at a later date is not as intuitive as it could be. A nice bright button on the home page after signing onto the app would be great, BOOK ANOTHER? Having said that, the app keeps me logged in, so that may be a problem. There's no readily identifiable way to delete mail after having read it.

Got stuck in the cold after they took money for a reservation. 20 minutes on the phone asking where my confirmation is if the money was held only to be told that the system was "updating". On a Saturday night, it was "updating". Not enough to completely shut down the app or website, just enough so that it places a hold on your money while leaving you out in the cold waiting for a confirmation or support to answer your call

This site has the worst useless outsourced customer service and lately I've had nothing but screw ups on their end with bookings. After paying much more due to errors they will not fix on their end with room type and billing, I am uninstalling this app. If you have a problem with your booking (and there's a good chance you will using this app) you'll spend an hour talking to a rep in another country who will tell you how they cannot fix the problem. Also you get worst rooms (handicap, no view)

I've been a long time, regular user of this app/site. I booked a room 2 months ago for a room in a month from now. It was non-refundable but that was before COVID-19 & the closure of the border. I'm self-employed & am now out of work. The money I used to booked a room I am definitely NOT going to use due to a closed border should be returned to me as I clearly had nothing to do with travel restrictions. I can't get anyone on the phone or via web chat. How do I get my money back..?

title: World Traveller - Your Travel Map
description:
🗺📌We all love traveling, but some of you do it more than others. This app lets you keep track of the all countries and cities you have visited. This online scratch map is what you were looking for!

❓Discover a lot of curiosities about the places which you have travelled to! Which is the richest country that you have ever been? What percentage of the world have you discovered? What is the biggest country that you have ever been t?

📊In addition to that, it provides custom stats according to the trips you have done, as well as information about all the countries of the whole world: population, currencies, visas, passport comparison, etc.

📕You can check what kind of visa you need for every country in the world depending on your passport. Check it before you plan any trip!

✈ Login with Google or Facebook and keep your data FOREVER. You will have your own scratch map ready in every device you use!

If you are a true "world traveller", don't doubt and keep this app on your phone!

List of features:
★ Travel tracker: Have a track of the places you have been. Countries, cities, territories, towns...
★ Offline database of countries. Use the application without internet connection. We know that you don't have roaming everywhere!
★ Customized stats. Discover the Nothernmost, the richest, the biggest, the most populated country you have been. You have tens of interesting stats that you can check!
★ Set your cities as favorites or in your list of wishes.
★ Curious about any country? You can check plenty of interesting data like the area, GDP, population, flag and more!
★ Login and save your data for have it in every device that you own!
★ Available in 15 languages: English, Spanish, German, Italian, French, Romanian, Russian, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Turkish, Finnish, Portuguese, Polish, Belarusian and Slovakian.
★ Currency converter which automatically detects your currency and the country you are in.
★ Check the type of visa you have to every country.
★ Export and import your data, make your own backups just in case you are going to change your device.

Designed and developed in Gijón 🔴⚪Asturias 🔷🔶Spain 🇪🇸

recentChanges:
- Is not enough for you to have maps of countries and cities? Be ready because a lot of new maps are about to come. Just for starting you have a new map of coins of the world and one of football stadiums ready to download. What are you waiting for?
- Now you can "Like" our new Facebook page from the menu.
- Improvements in the quality of the code.
- Fixed minor bugs.
comments: Great App! Really Useful! It's Fantastic for planning future trips, and I love sitting and looking at all the places I have been! A really Fantastic App!
This app is well designed. Has a lot of good information about each country including if a visa is required as well as what type of visa.
The best travel map I've seen, love the additional stats on my travels!

Very good app. Been using this app for almost a year. But I hope there is an option to display whole map in one view. Or option to print whole map in one page. I want to print it out and put in on my room wall. Thank you :)
Great app. Further look shows quite a number of Caribbean islands are missing. As well as Hong Kong

title: SaveTrip - Travel itinerary & Travel expenses
description:
* Visualizes itinerary as timelines

* Track expenses and manage budgets
   - Available all currency
   - Manage cash budget
   - Graph statistics by category, persons, currency

* Expenses will automatically be converted to your home currency

* Scrap feature (web, blog, Google Maps, etc.)

* Notes

* Checklist

comments: This is a nice app to keep records of everything about your trip. Please add a few more functionalities like the ability to insert or rearrange paragraphs inside the diary. Sometime you forget to write about something and you want to insert a paragraph between earlier paragraphs and I don't think it is easily feasible right now. Trips are arranged by days like from 5 jan to 10 Jan you travel. But is it possible to take into account the time? Like before 5 Jan 3pm is considered before the trip.
I love this app so much, very easy to use and many features are great. Even you have to pay for export to PDF, Excell
Like the features it offers but it's quite buggy. Particularly annoying not being able to change the plan item location or time once created.
This is the best app i was looking for. I just also wanted one more features where I could store the tickets PDF/Images wherever required.
Requires you to pay just to search for your destination on the map. What a scam.

title: SmartTraveler
description:
Smart Traveler, the official State Department app for U.S. travelers, 
invites you to see the world with easy access to frequently updated official country information, 
travel alerts, travel warnings, maps, U.S. embassy locations, and more.

With Smart Traveler, you can create personal itineraries, add notes, and organize your trips.

Smart Traveler also provides access to the State Department's Smart Traveler Enrollment Program (STEP). 
Free STEP enrollment enables the State Department to better assist you in emergencies such as natural disasters, 
unrest in foreign countries, or lost/stolen passports overseas. During your travels, 
STEP can help your family and friends reach you in an emergency.

Smart Traveler also provides quick access to the Department's Consular Affairs Facebook and Twitter pages.

Washington, District of Columbia 20522
recentChanges: Privacy Policy link has been added to the About page.
comments: It isnt even updated in real time, obviously. That is pure incompetence. Use the website, this app is a joke. The UI is laughable.
Won't let me sign it. I put in user name and password and click sign in and nothing happens. This is a worthless app for my needs.
Great info on each country. If one is going to travel out of country this is the best app for country info.
Unless continental drift has accelerated exponentially this past week, you should probably put the information regarding Israel under Israel instead of Iceland.
It stopped me by telling me my email is not configured correctly...well ok... been using that address since 2014, still using it now...whatever.

title: Tripadvisor Hotel, Flight & Restaurant Bookings
description:
Plan your vacation and book an amazing trip, with millions of travel recommendations and reviews from travelers like you on hotels, must-do experiences, top places to eat and other nearby vacation hidden gems. Tripadvisor is the perfect travel planner, helping you book a table at restaurants and compare low prices when booking hotels and flights for your next trip.

The Tripadvisor app is the ultimate travel planner, and is free and easy to use:

• Access over 830 million reviews of hotels, flights, things to do, vacation rentals, and restaurants from travelers like you
• Use our planning tool, Trips, to save and organize your travel ideas for hotels, restaurants, tours and attractions and see them together on a map
• Find great deals on hotels by comparing the lowest prices from more than 200 booking sites worldwide
• Search and book the world’s largest collection of tours, attractions and experiences
• Modify or cancel most tour, attraction and experience bookings for free
• Access mobile tickets for booked tours and activities
• Use Google Pay or PayPal to make tour or activity bookings
• Find great food wherever you are and reserve tables at local restaurants
• Compare airfares and find great deals on flights
• Browse and book Travelers’ Choice award-winning hotels, experiences, restaurants and more
• Get answers on specific questions from other like-minded travelers in the Tripadvisor forums
• Add your own reviews and photos of places you’ve visited
• Quickly discover nearby hidden gem travel recommendations, find and book must-see things to do while on your trip as well as reserve tables at great restaurants
• View traveler and local recommended places on a map while on your trip

While on a trip, use the app to view nearby hidden gems, hotels, restaurants and top vacation tours and attractions on a map -- then save ideas for later, or book your favorites on the spot and visit a city later. The Tripadvisor travel planner app uses your location to send you great travel recommendations and we  share this information with trusted third party partners to provide you with a better experience. Note that your location is collected even if the app is in the background.

recentChanges:
We frequently update the Tripadvisor app to make it even more useful to travelers like you. Here’s what’s new:

• Various performance improvements and bug fixes to help you find great places nearby, wherever you are
comments: Very good app! If you're planning a trip or even looking for local options, you need this app. It's definitely one of my most used apps for a reason. It's very informative and helpful. It allows you to save things you find at a location to your "places" list that you create so when you go, open your saved destination and have at it. I planned a weeklong Vegas trip of things to do, places to eat, etc this way and never missed a thing. I ran out of vacation before I did options! Highly recommended

This app is slowly improving. Most things you can do via the web interface, you can do with the app. However irritations such as embedded links not always opening, and the Inbox being slow to update private messages, mean that its not quite there yet.

Have used this app for years. It has generally been very good. However I would suggest it would be more user friendly if a review writer was able to get into a review he has made. The reason being that some times after a report has been posted a writer picks up an error he has made. At present time it is a real drama to try and sort it out. If the writer could get into the review and edit it there and then, no dramas that would be a real plus. Just a thought. Regards Kiwi nev No action yet.

This app is not very good. It tries to do a lot, but does it poorly. To search for a specific listing you're better off using Google. I tried writing a review and adding photos, and the app is painful in this regard - it just doesn't work properly. If you can, use the desktop version of the website, because it's less painful. You would after all these years that the developers might finally get it right. Sadly, this is not so.

For checking out Hotel reviews it's fine. But I don't like it for booking a trip. Does not give clear per person pricing. Mostly just per night cost of a room. I want to know exactly what I am paying for. Even for rides to the Airport it says may include an extra charge. Then doesn't say how much. Think I will keep using a Travel agent. I don't want any surprise charges later.

title: Wanderu
description:
Search, compare and book buses, trains and flights across North America and Europe.

Wanderu searches hundreds of ground travel and flight options to find you the best travel deals. Search bus, train and plane routes in the United States, Canada, Mexico, United Kingdom, Germany, France, Spain, Belgium, The Netherlands, Iceland, Ireland, Poland, Austria, Switzerland, Italy, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Croatia, Serbia, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Romania, Greece and many more.

• Best New App - Google Play
• Favorite New App - TIME
• Best Travel App of 2019 - PC Magazine
• Best Travel App to Use in 2019 - Newsweek

Score awesome deals on tickets from Wanderu’s official partners, including Amtrak and Deutsche Bahn trains, Greyhound buses, Megabus, Boltbus, Peter Pan Bus Lines, Adirondack Trailways of New York, Turimex Grupo Senda, Red Coach and many more in North America. European Partners include Flixbus, OUIBus, National Express and others. Wanderu offers the widest selection of trips available - online or in-app! Find bus tickets as low as $1 and hit the road.

NEW: Find and book flights to thousands of destinations across North America, Europe and beyond. Search flights right alongside bus and train routes to discover the travel option that fits your needs and budget in the best possible way. Flights on Wanderu are currently in BETA mode as we continue to expand our trip inventory and further enhance the user experience.

What the media has to say about Wanderu:
• “Wanderu is easy to use.” - The New York Times
• “Makes finding and booking cheap tickets for buses and trains super simple.” - Lifehacker
• “It helps travelers find the best ticket prices, at the most convenient times.” - TIME
• “Providing a more enjoyable and cheaper form of travel.” - Elite Daily
• “It can be frustrating to switch from site to site looking for a cheap, convenient option. Wanderu solves that problem.” - The Economist
• “Wanderu makes it much easier to book bus trips” - Mashable

FEATURES:
• Easily FIND, COMPARE and BOOK bus, train and plane tickets.
• No booking fees and always the lowest prices.
• “My Trips” section to keep all of your reservations in one place.
• View your past searches and save your favorite frequently searched trips for quick reference in the search history.
• Mobile boarding available for some carriers - just show your app to board!
• Choose your options based on the amenities and extras that matter to you - free WiFi, extra leg room, in-seat power outlets and more.
• Wanderu combines, in real time, itineraries from multiple bus and train lines to create a unique journey, not available anywhere else!
• Find the best walking or driving directions to or from the station/airport to your final destination.

COME WANDER WITH US:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GoWanderu
• Instagram: http://instagram.com/wanderu
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/GoWanderu
• Pinterest: http://www.pinterest.com/Wanderu/
• Flipboard: https://flipboard.com/@Wanderu

Skip the lines and enjoy the ride. Wanderu is the simplest way to book buses, trains and flights!

comments: This app is awesome! Was able to get a greyhound ticket that departed that same day & was sold out on greyhounds website. Not only that, but it was also for less than half the price too! I hope one day it will expand to include even more modes of travel & companies. Oh by the way, I actually found wanderu through their website, not the app, & for some reason I could not purchase the ticket through the browser on my PC or my phone browser but it worked in the App I don't know why....
worked flawlessly for booking an urgent ticket- would reccomended this app over the Amtrak App, Greyhound App and others. Extremely useful! Thanks, developers
Very smooth interface. Provided a variety of options and quick booking response.
Was easily able to find my tickets for a cheap price. Made it very simple to compare and sort the tickets from different carriers.
Very easy to use, would definitely use this app all the time for bus and train bookings.

title: Southwest Airlines
description:
Book a flight in just a few easy steps
Check in, change or cancel your flights. Plus, add extras like EarlyBird Check-In®.

Super-Fast Shopping & Booking
Book a trip in just a few quick taps. Make it even faster when you use your stored credit cards or PayPal® account.
 
Everything you need to Travel
Get the information you need right at your fingertips on the home screen - gate information, boarding position, flight status and more. 

Boarding Pass on the Go
Get your mobile boarding pass 24 hours in advance. *To obtain your own boarding pass on a multi-passenger reservation, you must be logged-in and have your Rapid Rewards® number associated with your trip.

Inflight Entertainment
Use the app to take you to our Inflight Entertainment Portal where you can watch Free Live TV1, listen to Free Music1, play Free Games, access on-demand TV content2, and watch Movies without having to download a separate app2
*Available only on WiFi-enabled aircraft. Limited time offer. Where available. 1Due to licensing restrictions, on WiFi-enabled international flights Free Live TV and iHeartRadio may not be available for the full duration of flight. 2To view movies and select on-demand TV content, download the Southwest app from the Google Play Store before your flight.

Live Chat  
Contact our Customer Representatives through Live Chat by scrolling down to Contact Us in the navigation drawer, and then tap on “Chat”.

Airport Pickup and Drop-off
Thanks to our partnership with Lyft®, you can now use the app to help you request a Lyft®! You’ll know key information like estimated time of arrival and estimated price before booking. More of a rental car person? You can do that in the app, too.

Cars, Hotels, and Vacations
Use our app to quickly book all of your travel needs. 

Earn Rewards when you Travel
Sign up for Rapid Rewards® and earn points on your flights. Did you forget to add your Rapid Rewards number during booking? – No worries, you can add it after booking your flight and still earn points. You can then use those points to purchase more flights!

summary: Traveling with Southwest Airlines is even more convenient with our mobile app!
recentChanges: You asked, we heard! You can now get mobile boarding passes for ALL passengers on your reservation, that’s right – all passengers, all boarding passes, one place, in your app!
comments: Southwest is hands down the best domestic airline in the US. While they are still expanding their available destinations, they already reach a majority of the continental US, consistently for the lowest prices around. I have been flying with them almost exclusively for the past decade when it comes to domestic flights, not only because of the ticket price but as well because the combination of spectacular customer service, flexible flights changes, and their two free checked bag policy.

Hard to use, couldnt update my credit card number, ap went straight to "pay". Only got 1 choice for a confirmation, when i denied it cuz i wanted to see what other options were, i was closed out of the ap with NO confirmation. I have no idea what happened as i have nothing to show for it. Hope i actually purchased a fare...

I fly with this airline twice a month with my 1 year old son. I love their staff and the service they provide. If it was only me,i wouldn't pay much attention to the service but there was one time ,ill never forget. I was running late and i wasnt able to purchase snacks at the airport for my son,they gave my son 100% attention and service. Water,juice multiple times and many many snacks . For that i will forever be thankful. Thank you ANN or ANA (flight attendant). See you all tomorrow!
I have found that the Southwest Airlines Application to be excellent and I have found absolutely no problems. I will continue to use this Application in the future.
I love southwest and the app! Easy to book a flight, easy to pay! Southwest is the only company I will travel with! Why? No hidden cost! Thank you Southwest!

title: Traveler Buddy - Trip Planner and Flight Checker
description:
TravelerBuddy is an innovative, time-saving and easy-to-use trip planner app. 

You can get one stop travel checklist for check flight status, flight delay, flight cancellations, local weather, currency exchange, customs regulations, visa requirements, passport validity, packing list and expense management
You can navigate easily to places such as hotel address with travel map even offline.
Our goal is to save time and provide paperless, stress-free travel for every traveler. 
You will get the following benefits. 

#1 Travel paperless
• Easy access your travel itineraries and its travel checklist on well-arranged trip card
• Have secure, PIN-protected access to digital copies of important travel documents

#2 Make your travel plans smoothly
• Create your trip checker automatically by simply forwarding all your booking emails (e.g. flight, hotel, restaurant) to trips@travelerbuddy.com 
• Manually edit and additional travel plans and its details, notes, and attachment

#3 Check flight status and save time
Always stay informed yourself before your trip about:
• Required passport validity and necessary visa requirements

comments: Would've been a perfect app, but: 1) too many required fields for everything. What if I don't know ferry terminal? What if there is only one terminal? What if pick up and return address for car rental is the same? Why separate fields for address, city and country? Should be simplified. 2) doesn't work offline. This app is really great as your Travel Companion, It's Literally my Travel Virtual Assistant. 100/100
Love Traveler Buddy!!! IT'S A GREAT APP TO HAVE ESPECIALLY GREAT FOR PEOPLE WHO TRAVEL ALOT AND HAVE MULTIPLE TRIPS THERE TAKING!! YOU'VE KEPT ME ORGANIZED AND SECURE IN ALL MY TRAVELS...HAGD!!!!
I used to like tripit. but traveller buddy is simply better on all aspects.
Travel buddy is the greatest app for help in travels. Download and try it.

title: Trip.com: Flights, Hotels, Train & Travel Deals
description:
Trip.com is your one-stop travel app! Book with us for great deals on:

■ Flights: International and domestic flights at great rates with no booking fees.
■ Hotels: Choose from over 1.2 million hotels, resorts, and apartments around the world.
■ Trains: Book tickets for the UK, Germany, Mainland China, Taiwan and Korea.
■ Tickets & Tours: Book attraction tickets in seconds, or take a private tour instead.
■ Rental Cars: Reserve your rental car online. Select from hundreds of makes and models.
■ Airport Transfers: Get picked up straight from the airport, no need to wait for a taxi.
■ Travel Guide: Not sure where you want to go yet? No problem – we can help!

The Trip.com app makes it easy to book hotels, flights, and trains at great prices. Quickly find the latest deals, check out exclusive member offers, and enjoy zero booking fees on flights and hotels. Join the thousands who already use Trip.com and save on your next trip! 

**Detailed Features List**

Find cheap hotels in minutes
- Select from more than 1.2 million hotels, resorts, and apartments around the world — you name it, we’ve got it!
- Still unsure about your plans? Cancel or modify your booking directly in the app.
- Sort by what's important to you: hotel prices, deals, ratings and more.
- Advanced filters help you find accommodation in your price range, in the ideal location, and with the facilities you want (like free Wi-Fi and a swimming pool).
- Over 30 million verified hotel reviews help you make your decision.
- Access your booking information offline for extra convenience.

Book the perfect flight
- Book cheap flights to over 5,000 cities around the world.
- Our advanced flight search engine allows you to find the ideal flight filtering by price, duration, departure or arrival time, or airline and stops.
- Cancel or modify your bookings easily right in the app.
- Need to fly into one city, but then fly out of another? Our multi-city search function can piece together your perfect flight.
- Have a fixed budget, but not sure where to go? Check out our Explore the World feature for the some great suggestions.

Search train tickets
- Easily book train tickets for Mainland China, Taiwan, the UK, Korea, and Germany all in one app!
- We connect directly with local train information centers, so you’ll see the most up-to-date information and prices.

Tickets and tours
- Whether you’re looking for Disneyland tickets, a skip-the-line pass to the Louvre, or an air ballooning experience, you’ll find it on the Trip.com app.
- Book a multi-day tour to see the sights of China, or a day trip for your Dubai stopover.

Reserve a Rental car
- Rent a car in thousands of destinations across the globe for a bargain price.
- Free cancellation is available on most bookings.

Arrange Airport transfer
- Never wait in a taxi queue again. Arrange for a professional driver to pick you up from the airport for an easy experience.
- Cancel up to 24 hours before pickup free of charge.

Manage your trips in app
- Track your flight status on the go.
- Add your itinerary to your calendar or save it as a photo for a smooth vacation.
- Get notifications on booking changes and much more!

We speak your language
- The app is available in 19 different languages, with payment available in 22 currencies.
- 24/7 English customer service is always at hand to help. Call, email, or chat to us directly in the app.

Need a luxury hotel in New York, or a last minute hostel in Prague? Maybe a budget flight with Air Asia or the luxury of first class on Emirates? Taking the train from London to Edinburgh? Or maybe heading down to Busan from Seoul? Wherever your journey takes you, Trip.com is the only travel app you’ll need!

Thanks for using Trip.com!

comments: More than the app the problem is their costumer service. 5 mails sent, 5 times they replied without spending one second to understand my needs, and without solving my problem. In other words, if you book with them, forget the chance to indicate your frequent flyer number, as in my case, and for 4 different flights, it was not possible. Never again.

The APP is not real time and definitely useless . I purchased ticket on february for a march 25 flt. I supposed to be asking for rebooking or refund because of flt cancellations due to covid, however my flt is not even listed in the app. My hard earned money will be wasted! I also emailed several times but an automatic reply has been sent with a useless message. Not useful at all!

This app is soo hard to cancel and the design is confusing. And because of the design, I was able to purchase additional baggage to my return flight instead of from origin flight. I tried to cancel it right away, just 2 minutes but there was no support, no customer support at all. And they still purchase it without minding the customers side. It would be better to purchase your flight right away to flight companies than making use of their useless service. Their service is only for making money

SCAM! Very deceptive and trashy app. It will change the price right as you're getting ready to pay. I checked actual airline site as well as others (couldnt use them because of my foreign credit card) mulptle times and the price hadnt change. The only amount that changed was the fees which began at 10 dollars and jumped up to 30. Pathetic they would stoop so low. That kind of trash should be criminal. Especially during a crisis!
I booked my ticket in this app but i cannot find my booking number in the airline official website. Now i cannot requesta refund for my cancelled flight. This company is only after your money.

title: Skiplagged — Exclusive Flights & Hotels
description:
Find flight and hotel rates you won’t see anywhere else. Save hundreds of dollars compared to other travel sites.

Discover extraordinary travel deals, set fare alerts, and uncover great hotel rates.

We’re so good, a big airline actually sued us for it!

• Find flights other search engines won’t show you -- including hidden-city flights and arbitrary round-trips
• Filter flights by duration, number of layovers, takeoff/landing time and more
• Explore lowest priced travel dates and see fare changes for flights
• Receive alerts when fare prices drop
• Book hotels as well, including last-minute hotels and special deals
• Filter hotels, read reviews and view traveler ratings

The fine print: a hidden-city flight is a flight where you get off at the layover rather than the final destination. For example, a flight from New York to San Francisco might be $300, but a similar flight from New York to Seattle with a layover in San Francisco might be $200. If you’re going to San Francisco we’ll show you both flights, and if you choose the cheaper one, you get off the plane at the layover (San Francisco) rather than going to the final destination (Seattle).

This is perfectly legal and the savings can be significant, but if you’ve never traveled like this before, you should read our hidden-city FAQ at http://skiplagged.com/faq

We’ll always show you all the options, so YOU can pick the deal you want!

comments: I used this app on two prior trips. On todays trip I am not able to check in on my local flight without a passport. Just learned that the original flight was to Toranto and even though I'm getting off in New York, it's treated as an international flight. To the point, I had to re-purchase a ticket for $283 in addition to the $100 skiplagged ticket that is non-refundable. Also, Skiplagged has no customer service to help you avoid these situations and in their terms, holds no responsability.

Helpful for plan making and dreaming. Not only does the search engine allow you to use the algorithm that gave them their name and got them in trouble (by saving us too much money), it also allows you to skip this search feature because there is more to it when saving money or searching for the right flight. You can browse price differences between airports, you can see predicted/lowest prices on different days and you can save your search for when the price goes down.

I have booked multiple flights + hotel rooms over the past 5 years with Skiplagged. It has helped us save money on travel and we have never had a single issue. On top of that, they recently gave me a full refund due to Covid-19 cancellations. This is a good company and I reccomend you try them out today!

I have tried SkyScanner, then moved on to Fareness, now here. Cheapest prices and app is very easy to use. It seems like they care about the little guy. I just hope they don't go too main stream and forget us like everyone usually does. That said. Try to use it before they get too big.

This has got to be the best app ever!!!!! I share it with all of my friends & family and it has increased our ability to visit one another across the states. * The prices are amazing. * You have multiple dates to choose from. * You are future travel dollars everytime you travel.

description:
Get HKD10 off select activities on your first purchase with the promo code MOBILE10*!
*Terms & conditions apply

Discover and book amazing things to do at exclusive prices!

Klook is a world-leading activities platform where you can book tickets at the best prices and enjoy savings on day tours, trips, and holidays. Klook provides you a seamless way to discover the best travel activities, amazing tourist attractions, and local experiences around the world!

Plan holidays you’ll love by choosing from a wide selection of fun sightseeing tours, family travel activities, transportation tickets, and captivating shows. With over 200 destinations globally, you’ll never run out of things to do! Browse and explore museums in Hong Kong, take guided tours of London, get Broadway tickets in New York, find local adventures under the sea in Bali, and more!

comments: Well, I use many apps for travelling but this app is totally different it not only provides you tickets and other stuff in lower price but also tell places to visit and things to do,in the area, loving it
Klook is a very easy app to use. Very convenient. Some times cheaper than the original sites. Also if you are in certain countries such as the UAE, you need a VPN to use this service

My credit card got hacked and it's suspicious that I can no longer access the app immediately after the fraudulent transactions, anyone else experiencing this? The last online transaction I've made with my credit card was with klook.

App allowed me to book activities of the place I'm travelling to which was convenient, but I suggest the app to include tracking status of those bookings e.g. I've booked a simcard which will delivery to me but I can't track it using the app But its still a nice app

Booking is easy, only if updating the activity can be done on the same app. One of my scheduled activity was canceled at 3 days before the scheduled date, however the status of my booking in the app was still shown as "Confirmed" without an indication of it has been canceled. The cancelation notice was send to my email instead. How I wish if the status update can also be made available in the app so that the user experience and expectations can all be managed at one place.

comments: Great when it works, horrible when it doesn't. Zero customer service if you book a hotel with them. No option to get a live person as phone disconnect after 10 minutes automatically (they don't ever answer). Email support isn't good either. The hotel I reserved with them had no AC. Hotel released me with no penalty but over a week and Id90 support still hasn't been able to fix the situation on their end. Use another travel agency.

For Hotels it is a great tool but be aware with the car rentals. We rented a car through the app and when we arrived at the car rental place in Mexico the internet price was only available with a $8.000 deposit and other prerequisits. We felt quite duped and had to pay $30 more a day than we thought initially. So we will not use the car rental tool anymore. We havent tried the flights yet

I just installed the app and I could not see any option for cruise in the trips selectin. The choices are hotel rentals and flight. Hi I am booked on a cruise through your website but I cannot get the details.
Great app, very informative. Keeps you up to date with everything from your trip to hotels that you booked. I love it!!
Dialing the dates for CC info was not easy. Had to dial and hold month while looking for year that didn't appear until after I it enter.

title: Travello - Your Social Travel Companion
description:
Travello is one of the world’s largest travel social networks with a community of travelling enthusiasts from 180+ countries. It connects you with fellow travellers, solo backpacking enthusiasts, digital nomads and even groups of friends & families to make your travel experience memorable. Travello enhances your trip experience by offering exclusive travel deals and a platform to share travel plans with your travel partners & post your latest vacation photos & videos on the feed!

With its social feed, the app lets you follow travellers & social media influencers, allowing you to find new trips to plan, tourism inspirations, traveling advice & much more! You can also blog your solo backpacking quests, couchsurfing experiences & group traveling shenanigans, and boost your social following by sharing your travel photos, videos, itinerary, travel advice & trip tips.

Find travellers & locals, by filtering travellers & locals nearby basis your interests, countries & languages. Travello makes sure you have a like-minded backpacking buddy if you’re a backpacking adventurer yourself. The app community lets you find, join & interact with traveling partners or backpacking groups basis your interests so you meet even more like-minded travelers. You can also organize or find meetups hosted by fellow travellers like traveling groups, solo travelers or even local hosts.

With Travello, you can discover exclusive deals on trips, local tours, tourist activities, traveling gear & accommodations. If you’re in a new city with your travel companions, then simply download Travello and plan your trip or use it as the best city guide ever!

Finding travel companions is easier with the app. Once you discover like-minded travelmates, message, connect & meet your new travelling buddies before you embark on your trip. Apart from being a social network to meet travel companions & buddies, Travello can cater to your couchsurfing needs by allowing you to meet people willing to host travelers, currently living in the city or the place you’re travelling to. The hosts will not only be your best city guides, but also turn your vacations into budget tourism by offering you & other tourists their places to stay. While it might not be on your itinerary, but as you interact with locals & try couchsurfing, you can explore more than just the popular tourist spots based on the locals’ suggestions.

Planning holidays on Travello is better than making a travel itinerary. Use the app as a travel planner to find travel tips, destination suggestions and things to do, all shared by your fellow travel buddies. Not just that, you also get exciting deals & offers to make your vacation more affordable. With Travello, you will even find the best city guides in the form of local hosts who will give you the best advice on things to do. 

While on the trips, you can share your experience with the community by posting your travel photos & videos and new travelling hacks and advice that you would have experienced first hand.

Travello is the perfect social travel app for everyone - backpackers, solo travelers, couchsurfers or group of travel mates and buddies. You can also use it as a future vacations planner by adding upcoming trips & holidays.

Features
A social feed to post travel photos, videos, stories or advice
70,000+ local travel deals, tours & activities
Travel buddy discovery - Search for travelers nearby. Filter them to match interest, countries, languages. Useful for people looking for couchsurfing hosts too
Interest Groups - Expand your network & find future travel partners & buddies on the community
Add/Search Trips - Use as a trip planner to plan vacations & holidays. Make travel plans & connect with travel companions before you arrive!
Chat - message other tourists using the app, connect, look around or party with them
Wi-Fi finder - Locate 100,000+ free Wi-Fi spots worldwide
Meetups - Organise or discover meetups, travel community events etc.
