You can also blog your solo backpacking quests, couchsurfing experiences & group traveling shenanigans, and boost your social following by sharing your travel photos, videos, itinerary, travel advice & trip tips.

Find travellers & locals, by filtering travellers & locals nearby basis your interests, countries & languages. Travello makes sure you have a like-minded backpacking buddy if you’re a backpacking adventurer yourself. The app community lets you find, join & interact with traveling partners or backpacking groups basis your interests so you meet even more like-minded travelers. You can also organize or find meetups hosted by fellow travellers like traveling groups, solo travelers or even local hosts.

With Travello, you can discover exclusive deals on trips, local tours, tourist activities, traveling gear & accommodations. If you’re in a new city with your travel companions, then simply download Travello and plan your trip or use it as the best city guide ever!

Finding travel companions is easier with the app. Once you discover like-minded travelmates, message, connect & meet your new travelling buddies before you embark on your trip. Apart from being a social network to meet travel companions & buddies, Travello can cater to your couchsurfing needs by allowing you to meet people willing to host travelers, currently living in the city or the place you’re travelling to. The hosts will not only be your best city guides, but also turn your vacations into budget tourism by offering you & other tourists their places to stay. While it might not be on your itinerary, but as you interact with locals & try couchsurfing, you can explore more than just the popular tourist spots based on the locals’ suggestions.

Planning holidays on Travello is better than making a travel itinerary. Use the app as a travel planner to find travel tips, destination suggestions and things to do, all shared by your fellow travel buddies. Not just that, you also get exciting deals & offers to make your vacation more affordable. With Travello, you will even find the best city guides in the form of local hosts who will give you the best advice on things to do.

While on the trips, you can share your experience with the community by posting your travel photos & videos and new travelling hacks and advice that you would have experienced first hand.

Travello is the perfect social travel app for everyone - backpackers, solo travelers, couchsurfers or group of travel mates and buddies. You can also use it as a future vacations planner by adding upcoming trips & holidays.

Features
A social feed to post travel photos, videos, stories or advice
70,000+ local travel deals, tours & activities
Travel buddy discovery - Search for travelers nearby. Filter them to match interest, countries, languages. Useful for people looking for couchsurfing hosts too
Interest Groups - Expand your network & find future travel partners & buddies on the community
Add/Search Trips - Use as a trip planner to plan vacations & holidays. Make travel plans & connect with travel companions before you arrive!
Chat - message other tourists using the app, connect, look around or party with them
Wi-Fi finder - Locate 100,000+ free Wi-Fi spots worldwide
Meetups - Organise or discover meetups, travel community events etc.
summary: Social network for travelers! Find travel mates, meet locals & get travel deals.
recentChanges: We release updates regularly, and we're always looking for ways to make things better.
comments: It is an excellent application, just started using it, still figuring it out, I would appreciate if you could add more on Pakistan and Iran as well as hotel booking options with points.
I liked the App. But interface sucks, delayed responses. It takes hell lot of time to actually post videos or photos. Developers should work on its interface please make this app more user friendly
Very bad, purchased tickets that never arrived, no really time support. Awaiting any support but not expecting it.
Good website for sharing travel experiences and meeting fellow travelers
I like this app, and administration is so good they address your issues

title: CheapTickets – Hotels, Flights & Travel Deals
description:
Earn CheapCash on select flights. Plus, hotels, cars, packages and activities!

The CheapTickets app for Android offers the ability to search and securely book the same selection of cheap flights, hotel rooms, rental cars and activities offered on CheapTickets.com. Plus, join our CheapCash loyalty program and start earning CheapCash on select flight bookings that you can instantly apply toward hotels in the app!  Use our convenient travel tools to view upcoming trip details, access address information and get maps for directions, receive alerts for flight delays, gate changes, hotel check-out times and more.  You can also find last-minute hotel rooms nearby and save 40% with mobile exclusive hotel rooms! CheapTickets offers a simple, secure booking process, and 24x7 customer support.

The CheapTickets app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.

APP16 Coupon Code Terms & Conditions
Subject to the restrictions set out in these terms and conditions, the 16% promotion code may be applied to a qualifying stand-alone hotel (not a hotel booking in combination with any other product such as flight + hotel, or flight + hotel + car) booked on a mobile device or the Cheaptickets app by December 31, 2020, for 1 or more nights of travel by December 31, 2021. Qualifying bookings instantly receive 16% off at check-out through the use of the promotion code. Customers are limited to one redemption of this promotion code and up to a maximum savings of $150 per booking. After this one booking, the promo code will not be able to be used again, even if the booking is cancelled. Exclusions may apply and most major hotel chains are excluded. The promotion code cannot be redeemed against taxes, supplier fees, cancellation or change fees/penalties, administrative fees or other miscellaneous charges, which are the sole responsibility of the customer. Discounts are not redeemable for cash for any reason. Promotion codes are non-transferable, not for resale, and cannot be combined with other offers or used for any booking previously made. Any attempt at fraud will be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. Void where prohibited, taxed or restricted by law. Cheaptickets reserves the right to change or limit the promotion in its sole discretion. Usual booking terms and conditions apply (see https://www.cheaptickets.com/p/info-other/legal.htm) and all bookings are subject to availability.

summary: Free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.
recentChanges: We've updated our app to make it easier for you to get information about travel restrictions and change your plans accordingly.
comments: I really do enjoy this app. Very easy to plan my entire trips for vacations & hotels when friends come visit. A hotel double booked me, & cheaptickets called me a few hours before my friends arrive to inform me, but booked another hotel at a higher cost, at no additional cost to me. It was greatly appreciated & I loved the service. I will keep using this service due to that.

Horrible. First CheapTickets sent Email about flight change/ cancel on march 8th. Without any clear information which airline canceled what flight. When I looked up my reservations they were not canceled by airlines. I went to SeaTac airport to find out myself what is going on. Alaska airline rep. Told that all third party companies doing this practice misleading customers so they customers start panicking and try all at once cancel their bookings. I will never again use this company.

I was very happy with my experience with cheap tickets, the agents were very helpful and curious and always had a pleasant answer to my questions and I will always choose them for all my Flight needs in the near and far future.
If I had a problem and I did several times their customer service is exceptional never rude always courteous helped fix the problem right away ty awesome app!!!
I've used Cheap Tickets for decades & still find it to be the best travel service.

title: Allegiant
description:
The official app of Allegiant Travel & Allegiant Airlines. Book your vacation online at www.allegiantair.com, then use this app to make the most of your trip.

Passengers can follow their trip on a card-by-card basis in the app. Each phase in the trip is represented as a card in a timeline of the whole journey. Just tap on the cards and follow the instructions to manage the trip, check in for the flight, display the boarding pass and get departure and arrival information. You can also book your flights via the app.

Passengers can also:
• Access and review upcoming trips.
• Automatically download trips onto their mobile phone if logged into their My Allegiant account.
• View and add seats, purchase bags and upgrade to Priority Boarding.
• Receive important flight status notifications
• Take advantage of a variety of self-service functions
• Provide feedback about their Allegiant experience

Using the Allegiant mobile app can save passengers money and will allow them to zip through the airport without ever printing a single piece of paper.

summary: The official app of Allegiant Travel & Allegiant Airlines.
recentChanges: This release includes minor performance upgrades.
comments: The app is horrible. I have been trying to change my information such as my phone number and my address because I moved. Every time I try to edit it gives me an error. I tried contacting Allegiant and they basically told me there was nothing they could do and that each time I book a flight I just have to take the extra time and put all the information in each time.

Great! I was able to make travel plans for my husband and kids without any hassle. I chose our seats which is made easy by the display provided of the plane layout. I was also able to pay in advance for our luggage and carry on. (It costs more if you do this at the airport) You are able to check in the day before your flight on the app. Boarding passes are provided as well with this app without having to print them out.They are able to scan your phone. Great experience!!!!
I can book flights and track them from the app. I have my boarding passes on my phone to keep from printing boarding passes.
The my flights option is no longer in the app so you can not view already booked travel. Really only good to book a flight. Not useful at all since the update
This app is meesed up. Itvwill mot allow me to check in. Makes me either check in on line or at the service desk upon arrival. Very frustrating!

title: Amtrak
description:
Discover the convenience of traveling with Amtrak. With the Amtrak app you can get simple and intuitive access to all the travel information you need, whenever you need it.

• Show your eTicket while onboard, including multi-ride and monthly passes - no need to print
• Purchase one-way, roundtrip, multi-ride and monthly tickets with dollars or Amtrak Guest Rewards points
• Check train status
• Find station information
• Edit and manage your account profile
• Save credit cards for quick checkout
• And so much more...

With the Amtrak app, you can do it all right from your smart device.
descriptionHTML:
Discover the convenience of traveling with Amtrak. With the Amtrak app you can get simple and intuitive access to all the travel information you need, whenever you need it.

• Show your eTicket while onboard, including multi-ride and monthly passes - no need to print
• Purchase one-way, roundtrip, multi-ride and monthly tickets with dollars or Amtrak Guest Rewards points
• Check train status
• Find station information
• Edit and manage your account profile
• Save credit cards for quick checkout
• And so much more...

With the Amtrak app, you can do it all right from your smart device.
summary: Managing your travel should be easy.  With the Amtrak app, it is.
developerAddress:
1 Massachusetts Ave NW,
Washington, DC 20001
recentChanges: Thanks for choosing the Amtrak app. We continue to fix bugs and improve the experience. Please check for updates frequently to take advantage of the improvements.
comments: Patience helpful, but considering the complexity and enormity of content, it works. Train Status function very helpful, as most trains are reliably not on time. Can be clunky. Useful to browse routes, learn about connections, make reservations. Many, many rules apply; critical to understand before purchase. App details most of it.

Convenient but Glitchy. It is a must if traveling on Amtrak, but it will often display an outdated trip count for multi-ride passes, 1 out of 10 times ticket purchasing doesn't work, and some days the app will not let either of my two phones login to show the conductor my ticket. Always keep a paper copy on hand or a receipt with the QR code in your email as a backup. But even with those issues, I use it every day and it is great for tracking and using Amtrak on the go.
This app is almost useless unless you know where the train routes go. There's hundreds of stations that don't connect so you have to play a guessing game for hours to attempt to plan a trip.

Terrible. Glitchy. Round trip tickets do not show up. every time I want to use a multi-ride ticket, I have to search through my email, find the number, go back to the app, then search for the ticket. it's insane. Also it doesn't show how many points my account has. That's not really important, but the fact that the app doesn't update from whatever database they have just shows another flaw. Sometimes it crashes without reason, other times it won't let you buy tickets without any error codes.
You can check the train schedule, buy your tickets and use this app to board the train. Really convenient! No standing in line to buy tickets.

title: Hostelworld: Hostels & Backpacking Travel App
description:
Make your travel dreams come true with Hostelworld, the number one travel app for wanderlusters! Browse the world’s best hostels and discover amazing affordable accommodation for your next travel adventure. 
Whether you’re looking for a private room by the beach or social dorm rooms in the city, the Hostelworld travel app makes booking easy and budget travel possible.


★ Find affordable accommodation in unmissable locations
+ Search over 17,400 hostels, across 178 countries worldwide 
+ From budget party hostels in Europe to picturesque eco hostels in Southeast Asia
+ Book private rooms or shared dorm rooms (mixed or all female options available)
+ Filter by location, price, room type, facilities and more 
+ Cheap rooms for any budget. Making travel possible for everyone.


★ Tried, tested and trusted travel app
+ Helping backpackers ‘Meet the World’ for over 20 years
+ Real reviews from over 12 million passionate travelers 
+ Rated on ‘value’, ‘location’, ‘atmosphere’ etc. by previous guests
+ Featured in Huffington Post’s round up of ‘Best Travel Apps’


★ Unforgettable experiences and events
+ Discover hostel events and local tours using the ‘Noticeboard’ feature
+ Find FREE activities, helping you meet like-minded travelers
+ Experiences to suit any backpacker. Walking tours, yoga, pub crawls and more


★ Packed with plenty of perks
+ FREE to download and use, forever! 
+ FREE cancellation on all bookings. (We know travel plans can change)
+ Translate up to 43 languages using the ‘Hostel Speak’ feature
+ Use your location to easily find the perfect hostel near you
+ Browse accommodation photos and view your future room
+ Get access to your booking info 24/7 with or without internet access
+ See where you’ve been on the interactive ‘My map’ feature
+ Get inspired by our ‘Top destination’ feature and discover top hostels in London, Amsterdam, Barcelona, Bangkok and more


★ Hostels for anyone, anywhere!
Literally, anyone…
+ Whether you’re a veteran backpacker, traveling around the world on a budget 
+ A gap year student on your first ever backpacking trip
+ Going it solo, in a group or with a loved one on a romantic holiday
+ Looking for a cheap vacation, budget holiday or epic backpacking trip?
+ Our easy-to-use travel app offers you the biggest choice of accommodation at the best prices.
Literally, anywhere…
+ Anywhere is possible with the Hostelworld app
+ Find accommodation across 178 countries worldwide
+ Hostels on the beach, in the city, even in the jungle
+ Book accommodation all over the world in an instant
+ Book whenever, from wherever. Whether you’re in Thailand or Italy, the USA or Spain… Access to the world’s best hostels, 24/7!


★★★★★
“Hostels are the best way to travel and Hostelworld is the best way to find them.” - Elite Daily


Want more travel tips and inspiration?
+ Hostelworld Blog 
+ Facebook 
+ Twitter 
+ Instagram 
+ Pinterest 
+ YouTube
Please take a moment to review us on the Google Play Store. Your feedback helps us improve our service for millions of travelers worldwide.

developerAddress: One Central Park, Leopardstown, Dublin 18, Ireland
recentChanges: We’ve been working on improvements so that you can have a better user experience while using Hostelworld’s App! This update also includes some bug fixing.
comments: Useless app, showing the hostel address incorrectly on the map. On the map the hostel was next to the Miami int. airport, but the hostel real location was very far away on Miami beach. Explained this to the chat assistant but it did not allowed me to cancel the booking without paying any fee. This was my first and last experience with hostelworld!!!

Everything is wrong with it 😢 The email link to it didn't work. Signing in on the app doesn't work. Help for these issues doesn't work. Cannot get into to anything to cancel my booking - not that I wanted to but only found out after booking that there's a upper age limit of 36! The blurb says the company is for veteran backpackers but obviously not! Very unhappy 😖

I'm a frequent user of the app. This week my travel got canceled by the coronavirus and they charged me anyways. There's no way to contact them to get a refund. The costumer service doesn't really exist and the hostel said that can't do anything about it. I feel robbed.
Very simple and straight forward, no tricks or games
Very easy to use. Love the map feature. Reviews are well done and descriptions accurate. Checking availability is simple and booking process is very quick and straight forward.

title: Greyhound Lines
description:
With the Greyhound app, everything about your trip is at your fingertips. It is your personal ticket kiosk – in the palm of your hand.

•	All access homepage - Access upcoming trips, book a new trip, find travel inspiration, station location information, and track your bus directly from the home screen. 
•	E-Tickets - The future of bus travel is here! We're making bus travel faster and easier than ever before by offering E-Tickets. Now when you buy your bus ticket from the mobile app or on greyhound.com you can choose to have a paperless E-Ticket delivered right to your smartphone – no waiting in lines, no waiting for an email ticket. Spend less time at the bus station and more time enjoying your trip!
•	Check-In - Check-In for any trip that is E-Ticket eligible from the Home screen or Trip details. Check-In begins two hours prior to your scheduled departure time. We’ll send you a message on your Home screen to remind you it’s time to check-in. 
•	Personalized updates - With our new design, you will get everything you need for your day of travel on the app home screen. Personalized messages will let you know when it’s time to check-in for your trip, count down until it’s time to depart, and even allow you to access your E-Ticket.
•	Road Rewards Members - Sign-in to your Road Rewards account, and you’ll have easy access to all your trips and tickets in one new convenient place called Trips. You’ll see all of your upcoming trips and have access to your travel details. If you are not a Road Rewards member, sign up now. It's free!
•	Trip details - You’ll see all your upcoming trip details and get notifications on when you can check-in for your E-Ticket. You can also easily find station location information and contact details, driving directions, or track your bus.

For details on what personal information we collect and for what purpose, your privacy rights and how to exercise them, visit www.greyhound.com/legal/privacy-policy/

summary: Booking your travel has become easier with the new Greyhound mobile app.
recentChanges:
Ticket Exchange
• Trips can now be modified!* Tap on `Modify Trip` in your Trip Details screen and swipe up to see how!
*eligible trips only

Bugs and improvements
• Minor bugs and performance improvements
comments: App is fine but could be better. I like how I can quickly book trips and skip going to counter. It remembers what I did previously which is nice. Negatives for me would be bus tracker does not work when looking at individual ticket but when you go to main bus tracker part of app you can put in your bus number. The other bigger negative is when looking at your trips there doesn't seem to be any order into the way they are displayed. I have to look through a random list to find my ticket.

Needs to have more ways to pay for the ticket instead of the usual way of going to the website which takes more data to load up the page. Vs the app having the pay pal option or just cash payment option. And being able to see the reservation in the app and store it in Mobile wallet in case you get locked out of your email account.

The worst travel experience you'll ever have starts with this app. Ticket selection sucks. It will automatically change your selection to a different boarding station without letting you know... causing confusion and mistakes. Then the "track bus" will fail to load, so you can't check whether the bus is late or if you're in the wrong station... More confusion... Finally, schedule numbers, confirmation numbers, and station addresses are all located on different menus... An amazingly awful app.

Signed in to a friend's account to pay for their ticket for it to change the passengers name to mine resulting in me having to pay to change the name back to theirs. That doesn't make sense. I shouldn't have to go back and change anything if it's already there to begin with. As soon as I put in my card info, I guess it changes the passengers name????? WHY? That's the whole point of me signing into their account, so all the info is already in place, so I can just put my card info in and be done.
The app is pretty easy to use. My advice, book single trip tickets instead of round trip. If your plans change you won't lose too much money.

title: CheapOair: Cheap Flights, Cheap Hotels Booking App
description:
Save up to 40% on your next flight! CheapOair lets you know when to buy. Simply watch a flight and get a notification when the price drops!

CheapOair is like having your own personal super-fast, all-knowing travel agent that analyzes up to 20 billion flights daily and lets you know the best time to book on the go.

KNOW the best time to fly and buy!

WATCH a trip to receive price alerts.

BUY in a single tap with Android Pay.

FLY with extra savings in your wallet.

CheapOair is an award-winning travel app. No spam. No ads. No popups. Just the confidence you’re booking smartly.

summary: Cheap flights and hotel deals! Booking app for airline tickets and cheap travel.
recentChanges:
In our most recent release:
- We've introduced Affirm, a new way to pay! With Affirm, you can pay for your booking over monthly installments.
- We've also made general usability enhancements and bug fixes.
comments: I once purchased a ticket to Miami and never went, well i couldnt get even get a credit for my next flight smh. But ive flown a few times more and everything was smooth. This is a great app for cheap flights planed at least a month in advance👍💯

The company and the employees are excellent. I first experienced the app few years ago, got nervous as I could see negative feedbacks about the company but my experience turned out to be wonderful and terrific. I tried again this year and the workforce has become even better. Even though you have to wait a little bit and be patient, it's worth it if you get served by the right employee. In my case, I highly appreciated the employee named Quinn as he/she made my travel become easier than ever.
Very complicated, does not pick input quickly, and does something else. Overlapping ads in a small space. Happy to uninstall.
They didn’t mention that I m allowed only one check in bag when I was booking the ticket. Usually It's always 2. Now I had to pay $200 extra. And customer service is always busy and horrible.
Good app to find cheap flights to anywhere in the U.S or the world. Easy to use Easy to compare prices, easy to buy tickets.

title: Funliday - Travel planner, collaborative editing
description:
Fun + Holiday = Funliday
The best trip planning App in the world!!!

Funliday is a trip planning app that makes your trip easier, helps you to manage your trips, find local attractions, and get directions. We support iOS, Android and desktop platforms. Funliday providers thousands of destinations, you can easily explore all of the places you are interested in and simply add them to your itinerary. You can also organize schedules and routes, as well as access all other useful information for your trip.

------Key Features-------
☆ Explore attractions all over the world.
☆ Easy to organize your trip.
☆ Support travel group (collaborative editing).
☆ Invite friends to join travel group.
☆ Offers offline trip.
☆ Provides driving/walking/public transit direction.
☆ Share your trip itinerary by email , WhatsApp and Line.
☆ Support desktop platform.


Like it, love it? Leave us feedback and a rating to let us know! We're all ears for your suggestions on how to improve, so if you've got any (or even if you just want to say hi!), drop us a message at prevengers@funliday.com. Have fun on holidays!

summary: Funliday is a trip planning App that makes your trip easier.
recentChanges:
5.7.82
New feature - Invite friends to edit itinerary via the link.
Bugs fixed.

5.6.79
A lot of tiny bugs fixed

5.6.35
Flight:
There are more aircraft options in route planning. As long as you enter the flight number, the flight information is fully presented.

Packing list:
A good helper for packing your luggage, you will never forget it again, and you can also customize your own list!
comments: I like some function of this app such as calculate travel time and selection type of transport, can drag and drop to change sequence, but I need some function such as can change location icon and adding picture because some place your data base not match with google map so no picture and detail for that location and It always loading to calculate travel time I think it will be better if it have the function to stop calculate time. It will be better if you data base of location link from google.

This is easily the most useful trip itinerary app I have used. It offer a very personal flexible approach to scheduling itineraries for trips without trying to be a travel agent. The app deserves 5 star rating for its innovative take on trip planning.
The app is good but I wish it would show the driving itinerary on the map and not a as the crow flies version of it. Also ads displayed in a different language are a bit distracting.

Went to delete unnecessary days from itinerary, explicitly selected to delete day 1, it asked was I sure I wanted to delete day 1, I confirmed selection, and it instead deleted 2 days that I did not select, one of which included my entire day's itinerary.
A convenient trip planner for traveling .

title: HotelTonight: Book amazing deals at great hotels
description:
Amazing hotel deals for tonight, tomorrow and beyond! Hotels give us discounts on their empty rooms. You get the best rates and deals, whether last minute or in advance. HotelTonight makes it incredibly easy to find and reserve a sweet deal at a great hotel. Three taps, one swipe, you’re booked! 

Google Play Store Editor’s Choice!  

•  From top rated luxury hotels to tried-and-true favorite rooms to cool, revamped former motels, we work with great hotels across the globe to get you the best deals (and only partner with hotels where we’d wanna stay, too)
•  Book a room for tonight, tomorrow, next week, next month and beyond – up to 100 days in advance in our most popular locations
•  Great for spontaneous vacations or planning a trip in advance. We’ve got the hookup for discounted last minute hotel bookings wherever you want to be around the world: North America, Europe, Australia and more!
•  Search by city, attraction or map location 
•  See ratings, reviews and photos from fellow bookers
•  Score extra Geo Rate savings off our already-discounted rates, based on your current location (find these deals marked in green in the app)
•  HT Perks program - the more you book, the better our deals get! Level up to score even bigger discounts
•  Hotel descriptions that boil down the top 3 reasons why we like the hotels we work with – and why you will, too
•  Simple categories (like Basic, Hip and Luxe) to make it easy to find the perfect hotel, inn, bed and breakfast, motel, resort or other lodging for you 
•  24/7 customer support (from real, live, nice people) for every booking
•  Access to HT Pros, our in-app concierge (a real-live person at the ready to make your stay great, from grabbing you an extra toothbrush to making a dinner reservation at a hot restaurant or bar near your hotel)
•  Supports paying with Google Pay


Some ways you can use us:
•  Surprise your BFF with a weekend in Vegas (leaving tonight!), or take your mom on a last minute vacation
•  Lock down that business trip in 10 seconds, at your soon-to-be-favorite hotel (or add a vacation day for play before or after)
•  Summer weekend road trips - hop in the car and reserve a room wherever the road takes you!
•  A mid-week booking or staycation at that retro motel you’ve always wanted to check out… just because
•  Score a luxury holiday in Paris on the cheap
•  Book a last minute birthday or anniversary trip (we won’t tell anyone you forgot)
•  Book a spontaneous summer weekend getaway on the fly

Let’s connect:
•  Facebook: facebook.com/HotelTonight
•  Twitter: @HotelTonight
•  Instagram: @HotelTonight
Got feedback? We’re all ears. Hit us up at: feedback@hoteltonight.com

Hotels we love. Deals you’ll love. Tonight, tomorrow and beyond. We are the excuse to travel as much as you’ve always wanted. Travel doesn’t have to be out of reach... we help you reserve discounted last minute or advance rates at awesome hotels. Weekend holidays, summer vacations, last-minute trips… open up the HotelTonight app and you’ll be on your way to a great stay. Whether you’re looking to find a last minute holiday on the cheap, take a road trip and see where you end up, hit the town and see where the night takes you, or just plan less and live more, we’ve got your back. Download now to get in on these sweet deals at great hotels!

Privacy Policy 
Terms of use

summary: No endless lists – we only show you the best deals at amazing hotels.
recentChanges: We update the app pretty regularly to keep things running smoothly. Occasionally we'll update with something really exciting. We promise to tell you when that happens.
comments: Shockingly poor experience. Opened an account. Tried making my first booking. My account was TEMPORARILY blocked due to a problem with card details (even though account and card was fine - not a problem at this stage). Contacted support. They said their processors automatically blocked my account and they could not tell me why but I am unable to recover my account or ever have an account in my name. ????????????
Easy app to use but it doesn't alway take your coupon. I had 2 coupons and it saying the $50 one was no longer valid even though that was the newest one. After 3 trys, it finally took the $25.
This site is fun to see all the hotels and the explanations are very good for you to make your choice. And the site rewards you for using it by discounting the hotels more the more you use the site.
For the past week I haven't been able to open the app because it keeps closing. I've uninstalled it twice and it's still closing. *It's back running now!!!
I love the app, but not it just keeps crashing even after updating, uninstalling and reinstalling. Help!

title: Michelin Travel guide, tours, restaurants, hotels
description:
Discover the world with Michelin! Explore 35,000 points of interest in over 80 countries, all reviewed by our authors. Find top sights for any destination.  Get trip ideas for top cities.  Find and book Michelin-selected restaurants, hotels and tours directly from your phone. Save your travel ideas to find later. Michelin Travel: your free travel guide!


• Explore content for 35,000 points of interest and thousands of cities, across more than 80 countries
• See the closest sights as soon as you open the app or find your upcoming destination.
• Take advantage of the Michelin star rating for sights : one star “Interesting”, two stars “Recommended”, three stars “Highly Recommended”
• Browse Top Sights for any location worldwide
• Reserve a table at Michelin-selected restaurants, shown right on the map
• Book cut-the-line tickets, tours, and activities with our partners
• Find and book hotels, wherever you travel
• Follow unique Walking Tours made by our authors, starting in must-see areas of Paris
• Get inspired by 3-Day Itinerary suggestions for Paris, Rome, New York, Barcelona, London, Venice, Amsterdam, and Brussels
• Favorite your travel ideas to easily find again later
• Get instant travel directions to any point of interest, using your preferred navigation app

Michelin Travel uses your location to find great ideas wherever you are.

Please let us know what you think (and how we can improve!) at: mvoyage-app-uk@tp.michelin.com


Examples of covered countries and cities:

Europe 
The Netherlands: Amsterdam, Rotterdam
Spain: Barcelona, Madrid, Valencia, Seville
Germany: Berlin, Munich
Great Britain: London, Edinburgh 
France: Paris, Nice
Italy: Rome, Venice, Naples
Czech Republic: Prague

North America 
United States: Chicago, Los Angeles, New York, San Francisco
Canada: Montreal, Vancouver, Toronto

Central and South America 
Brazil: Rio de Janeiro
Mexico: Mexico City
Argentina: Buenos Aires
Chile: Santiago

Asia 
Thailand: Bangkok, Chiang Mai
China: Beijing, Shanghai
Hong Kong 
Singapore 
Japan: Tokyo
Australia: Sydney

Middle East 
United Arab Emirates: Dubai

developerAddress:
Michelin
27 Cours de l'île Seguin
92100 Boulogne-Billancourt
recentChanges:
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
We hope that this new version will help with the preparation and smooth running of your holidays.
Michelin Travel wishes you a wonderful summer!

Please feel free to share your satisfaction by posting a review on the store.
comments: It's weird that any app that functions internationally doesn't have an option to select your currency or to change units of measurement, just really lazy. And the fact that you can't sort results and that the filter option is so barebones is really the nail in the coffin for me. I don't want just a long list of things and places or I could just read travel blogs, I want to be able to narrow stuff down from that list and get good info at a glance. This app just doesn't provide that.

Overall it is a good map application with tons of useful POIs but it would be even more useful if the developer could add functions like POIs filtering (hotel, eateries, shopping malls, landmarks...) and also allow the user to add their own POIs. Map maker allows users to add their own POIs and it makes it a winner. But their database is not as rich as Michelin's.
Best traveling unbiased, unpaid, unmarketed opinions. If you want to get out of the crowd, and get local insights without surprises, this is the way to go.
No search filters. Just shows random stuff on a map but can't search. Hardly useful.

Distances in kilometres which is fine as are the signs in Europe. Amazing lists of places to visit, not many restaurants but hey ho. For a free app to find places to visit around where you are travelling it is great

title: Viator Tours & Activities
description:
Discover and book travel activities wherever you go.

Viator, a TripAdvisor company, is the world leader in offering amazing tours, activities, and travel experiences around the world. Discover and book unforgettable things to do—anytime, anywhere—with our app.

Make the most of every trip with instant access to:
●    200,000+ bookable experiences
●    Skip-the-line access and mobile tickets
●    Millions of trusted traveler reviews

Whether you’re planning a trip to Paris, Tokyo, or anywhere else in the world, we’ll make sure it’s one to remember.

summary: Travel Deals & Booking
recentChanges: This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Good options to travel and explore. Updated information about tourist places is a good feature of this website.

Love the 3.9.5 version of the app, it gives all of the same info as the website with a great layout. All of the updates are trash. You're best bet is to get the apk of the previous version of the app, otherwise searching for tours on your phone will not be worth it. Oh yeah, and the tours I've booked have gone well, this is just a review of the app.

While all the tickets I bought for Italy worked, it's really annoying that I cannot see the full itinerary on the mobile version and will still need to redirect myself to the web version to fully read up on the tour before I book.

No way to get mobile tickets on iOS or android. In addition, I tried reviewing the tours I took and the app refused to post my review, telling me to try later, then my review is gone and have to type it again. After two trials I have app. One of the worst apps out there!

Sorry to give low rating.... I love Viator, BUT this app is severely lacking... 1) you can search by location OR keyword, not both. If your trip is on Hawaii, and you want to go paragliding, you have to scroll through paragliding in dozens of other places first 2) can't add things to wishlist 3) wishlist can't be divided (e.g. by location when planning multiple trips) 4) setting date of travel should auto populate check availability, yet the ca keeps going to "tomorrow" Just a few major things..

title: Kiwi.com: Best travel deals: flights, hotels, cars
description:
Kiwi.com's unique booking system gives you access to the world’s cheapest flights, hotels, rental cars and train tickets. 

Save up to 90% on direct prices with our advanced algorithm and exclusive industry deals.

With Kiwi.com you can select the best prices for: 

Flight tickets 🛫
Hotels 🏨
Train journeys 🚃
Rental cars 🚗

Finding travel bargains has never been simpler.

“Kiwi.com will find you the cheapest international flight tickets.” 
- Condé Nast Traveler
 
“...so clever that once you understand how it works you cannot help but be impressed.”
- Business Insider
 
“Kiwi.com helps you figure out where you can fly within your budget.”
- The New York Times

5 REASONS YOU SHOULD USE KIWI.COM
1. Super savings - Kiwi.com is proven to offer the lowest prices on flights, hotels, train tickets and rental cars
2. Lightning fast search means almost instant results
3. Simple price calendar helps you to compare the cheapest deals
4. Responsive customer support in 17 languages
 
Kiwi.com’s advanced algorithm scours the marketplace for the lowest-cost deals. You can see the best deals for your dates, choosing your perfect price.

Proven as the world’s leading low-cost flight agent, we’re now able to use this technology to bring you the world’s cheapest hotels, train tickets and rental cars. 

Saving up to 90% on booking directly, Kiwi.com offers savings you’ll never get with bigger carriers. Plus, with no commission to pay, Kiwi.com we’re cheaper than other online agents too.

Be a NOMAD

Want to visit more than one country? We’ve got you covered.

Kiwi NOMAD takes the stress out of booking your multi-city trip. Simply Enter the destinations you want to visit and Kiwi NOMAD will calculate the cheapest possible route between them.

You can chop and change the flights and destinations until you find your perfect trip. All at the lowest possible cost, of course!

Bonus

Our Price Alert feature alerts you to price drops and new deals meaning you will always get the best price with Kiwi.com.
 
Explore destination

Wherever you want to go, Kiwi.com is your ultimate travel partner. 

We think booking should be fun! Choose ‘Everywhere’ in the destination field, see cheap travel deals from across the world and book your dream flight.

Don’t forget to select the breathtaking hotel to stay at and your travel connections in advance - all with Kiwi.com of course!
 
Never worry about luggage size

Available in the app, Kiwi’s augmented reality baggage measurement tool can help you pass baggage control with no hold-ups. Just point your mobile phone’s camera at your bag to get a visual confirmation that it will pass airport check-in. 

Once you’re done, pack your bag, book a hotel and rent a car - all within the same app. Happy travels, globetrotter!
 
Where to go this year?

Don’t know where to go? Get inspired by the top 10 most popular travel destinations in the US!
 
1. Mexico City (MEX)
2. Havana (HAV)
3. Rio Negro (MDE)
4. Barcelona (BCN)
5. London (LGW)
6. Paris (CDG)
7. Prague (PRG)
8. Rome (FCO)
9. Toronto (YTZ)
10. San Juan (SJU)
 
Did you know there are 195 countries in the world? We do - because we operate in all of them. Kiwi.com offers almost limitless combinations of flights, hotels, train tickets and rental cars. It’s a total travel app.

So, what are you waiting for? 
 
Get the cheapest travel deals anywhere and everywhere. Start your booking now!

summary: 🇺🇸No winter lasts forever! Flights to Santa Barbara from $78🏖️
developerAddress:
Palachovo nám. 4
Brno 625 00
Czech Republic
recentChanges:
Hi there.
Thanks for updating the Kiwi.com app. As always, we're doing everything we can to improve your mobile travel experience.
• We've updated the booking flow, separating it into multiple steps, allowing you to focus more clearly on what's required of you in each step of the process.
• R.I.P. to the numerous bugs we eliminated.
We appreciate you & your feedback. It helps us focus our design and development efforts to provide you with the very best mobile user experience.
comments: As long as there is no problem with the flights booked through this app, everything seems fine. But my flight was cancelled and they didn't even send me an email... i wanted to contact them by email, but no i can't, because email support is not available for my basic service package. You booked a flight for me and now it is cancelled, you should notify me on time and refund me!!

The app works, the company sucks, even if your flight is cancelled or if the airline allows you to change the dates free of charge or to request a full refund, you cannot with them as they use their own emails to book your tickets so you cannot get in touch with the airline directly. They will not refund you fully even if the airline said so. Plus unless you have paid for full pro package, you cannot get in touch with them pretty much.

One thing that would make this five star is if you could adjust specific segments of trips with multiple legs, especially on multicity or nomad trips. So for example, let's say I have 3 flights/transits and I find the perfect package for a departure and a return but I want to change the time of the middle leg, I should be able to freeze the departure and the return and simply choose a later/earlier flight for the middle leg. In short, let us freeze options we like and edit parts we don't like

The app is ok to use but the service is really poor in general. I found out that my flight was cancelled by accident and had to request for a refund which they seemingly accepted but now they have given me an ultimatum to choose from; Accept £10 from them or wait up to 6 months to find out how much Ryan Air will refund when this shouldn't be the case as Ryan Air have already disclosed that they are issuing refunds. So it is a win, win situation for them and total loss for me!

The app doesnt work to update the reservation when it's changed by the airline and the customer service is terrible. My flight was cancelled and it still showed as confirmed on the app with no option to get a refund. I spent more money and upgraded so I could chat and still no word from kiwi even days later. Slim chance of getting a refund now - I've exhausted all ways of contacting kiwi, even emailing app support and no response!! Don't use!!

title: Trip Planner: India's Best Travel App by Holidify
description:
Holidify is the best travel app to plan trips in India and search for travel guides in India. Holidify is the highest rated trip planner app and has been designed by travel experts from India. This app lets you plan your travel itinerary by giving the best travel guides on all tourist places in India.

Decide Where To Travel With Holidify

Planning your trip with friends and not yet decided where you should go? Don’t worry, we will help you first decide you on your perfect travel location and then help you plan your travel. 

You can use filters to customize results based on number of days of the trip, your current location, best time to visit, popular and offbeat locations and region where you want to travel. Personalized travel recommendations also help you get great suggestions. 

Explore Places For Your Next Trip

Discover popular tourist destinations, offbeat places that are not crowded, places for adventure sports, trekking, skiing destinations, rafting, mountain biking, paragliding, road trips and more

Explore holiday ideas and plan the perfect summer vacation holiday with your family. Find beautiful honeymoon destinations, adventure hubs, exotic beaches, hill stations, deserts, wildlife sanctuaries, tiger reserves, caves and more on Holidify travel app

Some popular trip ideas: 

•Holiday in Leh Ladakh, Shikara rides in Srinagar, Kashmir Valley, Mcleodganj, Khajjiar, Manali and Shimla Tourism in Himachal Pradesh

• Golden Temple in Amritsar, World Heritage Sites in Delhi, Havelis and Forts of Rajasthan, Taj Mahal in Agra, Ghats of Varanasi, Temples in Mathura and Vrindavan, Toy Train Rides in Darjeeling

• Travel to unexplored places in Sikkim, an exotic trip to North-East, waterfalls in Meghalaya, trekking in Nagaland

• Plan a trip to hills and beaches of Kerala or plan a trip to exotic islands of Andamans or Lakshadweep

Travel Guides And Top Things To Do

Plan your travel with well-researched information about various places like best time, top things to do, HD photos, tourist maps and where to stay, top restaurants with local food, vegetarian food, etc.  You can also get the cheapest and best travel quotes for your trip from highly rated travel agents for free. 


Plan Weekend Trips

Using Holidify’s Trip Planner app, you can explore 100s of weekend getaway places near Delhi, Tourist places near Bangalore, road trips near Mumbai, treks near Pune, beaches near Chennai, hill stations from Chandigarh and many more. 

How To Reach Between Any Two Places In India

Holidify Trip Planner also helps you find best ways (cheapest and fastest) to reach any place in India from anywhere in India. 

Travelogues and Amazing Blogs Curated By Travel Experts
Browse through various articles and listicles to explore new beautiful places every day. Read informative travel stories to plan your trip and ask questions from travellers and travel experts.

 Beautifully Designed App
Sleek and Smooth UI of Holidify Trip Planner App has been rated India’s best travel app by thousands of people. It has been designed in a way that consumes less battery and very little data. It even works in offline mode and can help you plan your trip in matter of minutes.

Download it now – it’s Free and less than 10mb and consumes very low battery

recentChanges: Holidify has a fresh new look! All-new sleek design for the homepage to get your travel planning started even faster.
comments: Whenever I search for any location, it opens up & again returns to the home page. This has been a routine for the last 6 months. I also complaint about it but nothing happened. So uninstalled it!! Horrible 😣

Overall good app, but frustrating that default settings for hotel search cannot be changed. (Number of people in room, and filters). Every search requires the settings to be configured again and again. It would also be helpful to have a map showing all the accomodations together, to compare distance.
I liked a lot. I have a suggestion, if you add an option to plan holiday based upon weather conditions.
Best tourism guide app but need improvement on international spots how to reach tab bcz it shown wrong information.
It's better to know more about the place you are visiting and this app is good in showing that with possible near by loacations as well. Enjoy using.

title: Packing List for Travel - PackKing
description:
PackKing helps people around the world to organize their packing list for their holidays. Whether you’re planning a vacation with a loved one abroad or inland, the app generates your personalized packing list based on destination, planned activities, transport, and other personal needs. PackKing makes it easy for you to figure out what items you shouldn’t forget to pack into your backpack or suitcase for your weekend, business or holiday trip.

Supported activities of this packing list app are:
+ Essentials
+ Beach
+ Outdoor
+ Sightseeing
+ Going Out
+ Photography
+ Swimming
+ International
+ Hiking
+ Backpacking
+ Mobile Office
+ Cooking
+ Baby
+ Fitness
+ Camping
+ Business
+ Running
+ Diving
+ Festival
+ Cycling
+ Dog
+ Fishing
+ Surfing
+ Riding
+ Instrument
+ Golf
+ Wintersport
+ Boat

Supported transportation:
+ Air
+ Car
+ Public
+ Motorcycle
+ Camper
+ Cruise

Types of weather:
+ Cold
+ Mild
+ Warm
+ Hot
+ Rain

Key PackKing Features:
+ Configure your trip profile with destination, duration, activities, transport and laundry frequency
+ Easily scroll through the generated lists
+ Add items you want to pack
+ Check Items that you packed (like a checklist)
+ Add your custom items to the list
+ Create and manage custom luggage types
+ Manually sort the items of your list
+ Generate a PDF with all added items to pack
+ Export your list to other applications
+ Login to Backup and Restore your trips
+ Create multiple packing lists
+ Add your own custom topics and reuse them in your future trips
+ Switch between lists based on Topics (Essentials, Cruise, Beach, etc) to lists based on Categories (Hygiene, Health, Gadgets, etc) or Bags (Main bag, Carry-On, On person, etc)

PackKing is free to download and use. The free version has limited functionalities. Upgrade and have access to:
+ Unlimited packing lists
+ Export (PDF / other apps)
+ Backup your data by logging in
+ Reset and Copy existing lists
+ No ads

recentChanges: I am always making changes and improvements to PackKing. Based on user feedback I continuously add new features with the mission to make PackKing the best packing list. Feel free to get in touch with me by mail (hello@packking.info) if you have feedback.
comments: Buggy backup. I really liked the app at first as there are ample options to customize items and add categories. Being able to add custom bags is nice, although the app added several copies of the same bag. But when my phone crashed and I tried to get back my data, I got back my list, but not the content. I tried to send several emails to the developer to resolve the issue, but didn't get a response.

Frustrating!!! I paid money for this app thinking that it would save all of my lists. I added a Vacation list of 143 items or so and when I went back into the app to add more items, everything was lost and I had to start from scratch. There was no retrieval of it. I re-entered the list, went back in a few days later to add a few more items and same thing again - I lost everything. Wrote to the seller, never heard a response....terrible app! Waste of money and time!!!

Biggest problem for me with all these packing apps is that they come pre-configured with literally hundreds of items under sections that I will never ever use. As such I look for apps that allow me to edit Categories and the items in them so that when I select 'Beach' or whatever I only have to scroll through the items that I might normally take, not the 200 items I won't. Couldn't find a way to do this even with the paid version so, refund and delete. Far quicker to write a list out with pen and paper.

Very helpful app! Easy to customize to your specific needs. This will help you remember all of the essentials for your trip as well as helping you to not overpack. Once you compile your list, you can generate a shopping list of all the items that you need to purchase.

Probably the best packing list app I've ever tried. Being able to choose the items you need from a predetermined list is an excellent way to prevent forgetting important items or having to remove a large amount of items that don't fit your lifestyle. I definitely recommend this app for anyone who has difficulty packing or simply wants to make the process more efficient.

title: Triip - Earn to travel, travel to earn
description:
Have you ever thought about earning money in exchange for traveling? Travel, then get paid. “How can one even do such a thing,” you may ask.

Meet Triip: the only app that pays you to travel.

You usually pay for apps, right? The money is usually going in one direction, not the other. Triip is a blockchain booking platform where you can browse and buy accommodations, tours and unique local experiences. Think Airbnb or Booking.com.

But we’ve launched Triip with a feature that you won’t see anywhere else: an “earn” section where Triip pays you.

With this “unusual app” you can:
- Get  88 TIIM immediately after downloading (our cryptocurrency) for buying a wealth of services and nearly 6 million accommodations as well as 6,000 tours in 229 countries on Triip
- Share your travel plans to earn more TIIM while you're travel
- Spin the lucky wheel daily, complete a quest, do more to get more TIIM
- Share Triip with your friends. We’ll reward you for each new referral. 
- Get discounted entries to many services, tours, beauty shop.
- Join Triip workshops for more localized experiences

Last but not least, 1% of revenue from each booking goes to sustainability fund to make our environment better.

Triip has been recognized by legacy institutions like the United Nations, VISA and others. Our work has been covered in Nikkei and Forbes.

We’re extremely humbled and grateful for your commitment to Triip’s mission of building a sustainable travel economy.

comments: Great project and good app for traveller 👌
That balance update glitch is solved now. I'm happy. Though some options are not working, like "start a career" , "become a patron" , "triip quest" etc. Please tell us when are they going to work.
Nice app but Payment option not show,
Withdraw option is not working
Please update your app and available withdraw system.

title: CheckMyTrip
description:
CheckMyTrip brings all of your trip details together in one master view.  Ideal for business travelers and frequent fliers to stay productive and enjoy unique local experiences.  Essential for leisure holiday seekers to navigate unfamiliar destinations and maximize the fun.  It's free, easy to use and loaded with trip alerts, planning tools and more to get you safely from door to door.

BEAUTIFUL FEATURES AWAIT YOU

SMART TRIP ITINERARIES - Stay Organized
• Flight, hotel, car, rail, meeting, dining, tour & activity details organized into one elegant itinerary view
• 3 simple methods to add & organize your itinerary details:  forward booking confirmation e-mails to trips@checkmytrip.com; enter booking reference with first and last name; or manually enter the trip information through a form

HANDY TRIP TOOLS - Be Prepared
• Direct access to many airline check-in systems and seat maps
• Real-time notifications via push, in-app and email of flight status, terminal and gate details plus layover times
• 5-day weather forecast for each point in your journey
• Search and reserve taxi and parking options in 40 countries

AWESOME DESTINATION TRIP PLANNING SERVICES - Feel Like a Local
• First-hand local discovery of places nearby through Foursquare
• Search and reserve over 50,000 epic tour & activity options worldwide available through Viator
• Search and reserve over 41,000 great restaurant options in major cities available through OpenTable

READY TO TRAVEL FEARLESSLY?  
Getting started is easy.  Create an account using your Facebook ID or e-mail address.  Like Us on Facebook to access curated travel planning news, inspiration and tips.

We respect your privacy - [https://www.checkmytrip.com/cmtweb/web-desktop.html#/privacypolicy]

By downloading the app, you accept our Terms & Conditions of use - [https://www.checkmytrip.com/cmtweb/web-desktop.html#/termsandconditions]

WHO IS BEHIND CHECKMYTRIP?  
CheckMyTrip is brought to you by Amadeus - the technology company powering the travel industry.  We facilitate the entire travel journey, improving the travel experience so millions of people can travel fearlessly every year.  For more information, visit amadeus.com

**IMPORTANT REMINDER**
CHECKMYTRIP IS NOT A TRAVEL BOOKING AGENCY

We only display information related to the trip details you add to your CheckMyTrip account.  If you need to modify, cancel or source additional information about your air, hotel, car, rail, taxi, parking, dining or tour & activity booking - you must contact the provider directly for assistance.

recentChanges:
* App Shortcuts:
Simply long tap on the CheckMyTrip app icon to have immediate access to some of your favorite features: Add your trip, open your next trip, and book your next taxi and activity!
* Bug fixes
comments: Thank goodness for CheckMyTrip. Part of our flight was canceled, and another part of it re-routed. We have yet to be advised by the airline, but we got prompt updates with CheckMyTrip. We would have started the 2.5 hour trip to the airport without being aware of the changes. Love this app!

Promising but buggy. I downloaded it today considering it's from Amadeus, which is a well-known industry standard software, I was really expecting more. I have recently booked a return train journey and accommodation through well known booking sites. I have forwarded the details to the email address provided and only accommodation appeared in the app, but it didn't register half of the accommodation details and wouldn't allow me to edit and add those details manually.

Really enjoy the app, has made keeping up a lot of travel easier, but not 100% but that maybe due to the back end information source that is pulled was not updated timely. Have seen a few funky bugs. But for a free product - excellent. Would love to see a desktop interface portred.
Love this app and use it for all of my trips! Highly recommended! (we had a flight delay and this app alerted us before the airport or airline app even did!).
Great App. Keeps me up to date with my travel schedule. Sends timely reminders. Makes traveling much easier.

title: United Airlines
description:
Welcome to the reimagined United app.

Our refreshed app offers a more robust and dynamic experience, giving you access to personalized information throughout your journey – all while keeping many of the same features you know and love. 

Explore new features
-	Thanks to a redesigned home screen, the United app gives you quick access to important details by opening to the most useful and relevant information. At the bottom of the screen, a streamlined navigation bar will help you find the app’s most popular features. Other enhancements also include a “My Trips” section where you can find upcoming active trips, a “My Profile” section with your account information and a brand-new inbox that stores travel notifications. 

The app is your all-in-one travel partner
-	When it’s time to travel, check in for your flights on the home screen and view real-time updates. See what amenities are on your flights and your position on the upgrade and standby lists. While at the airport, explore interactive airport maps to find a United Club location near you.

Search for flights and book travel
-	Look for flights across our global network. When you find one that’s right, book it on the app using money or award miles. 

Easily manage your reservations on the app
-	View and change your seat assignments, or enhance your trips by adding Economy Plus® seating, Premier Access®, United Club℠ passes, travel bundles and more. You can also change, cancel or rebook your flights right on the app.

Continue using the app in the air
-	With United Private Screening on select flights, watch TV shows and movies on your own device. Plus, track the status of your checked bags and see which gate you’ll arrive to once you land.

Earn award miles with MileagePlus
-	Enroll in MileagePlus® and earn miles with MileagePlus programs. You can use these miles to book award travel on the app, too.

recentChanges: In this release, we’ve fixed a bug related to select movies not playing properly on Personal Device Entertainment.
comments: Ive used this app in the past many times for inflight entertainment with NO issues at all. Until yesterday March 14th the 4 of us in our party tried to it. we could look through all the movies and tv shows available however when we tried to pick a movie to watch a stupid error would pop up saying device needed to be in airplane mode to prevent interference. Well when you put your device in airplane mode WIFI disconnects. so NO United WIFI which means no movies. i had a isle seat so i was able to see some people watching movies. talk about a long 4.5 hour plane ride.

There are many useful and good features for this app, but I feel TREMENDOUSLY disappointed that the feature to scan my documents -- passport, etc. -- does not work. I have to visit a kiosk anyway. And also, why can't we provide scans for check-in on the United PC website? Why only in the app? Wouldn't it make international travel easier if we were able to do it both places? Wouldn't it be great if the scan feature in this app had worked for me this morning?

Not a great app. Crashes often, the inflight entertainment portion will not work on either my phone or tablet (makes for long flights when you were expecting to watch movies on the app), requires all kind of unnecessary permissions (microphone, location, storage...), very slow to react after clicking, can't check in, wouldn't recognize Canadian credit card, asks for ZIP code when I selected Canada (we don't use ZIP, we have postal codes). The text notification for flight delays did work though.

This is the worst travel app I've had, possibly the worst app. One click takes ~30 seconds to go to the next screen, at which point it just crashes. I like United, but this just screams lowest possible cost for an app and a QA process that consists of "Works on my device". Don't waste your time, kill trees instead, or fly with any other airline.

Could not select for non US credit card, even though there is nothing suggesting i am american. Passport photo process was finicky and took forever. And at the end of a gruelling process, check in failed with no explanation! Also wants your location, to run all the time and eat your battery. Wasted a lot of time with this surprisingly unfriendly app, makes me less likely to fly united and more likely to seek out competitors (what few remain) in the future.

title: Alaska Airlines - Travel
description:
Explore options, book trips, check in, and move easily through airports. Find all the flight information that matters to you, when it matters.

With our app you can book a flight, select a seat, or change your seats before you depart. We will get you through the airport faster with mobile check-in up to 24 hours before your flight. You can also save time by using our app as your boarding pass, no more kiosks or lines, just use your phone to get through the security check point at the airport.

Keep track of your flight information including flight schedule, boarding time, and airport gate changes. Share your travel itinerary with friends and family via email. Receive information about flight delays and more with push notifications.

When you’re at the airport you can keep an eye on First Class and Standby wait lists. You can change your plans to get on an earlier or later flight. We will also send you a notification, telling you if there’s an earlier flight available for you once you've arrived at the airport.

We also offer calendar integration for smartphones, so that you can add your travel information to your calendar. You can track your Mileage Plan™ balance and then use those miles towards flights you can buy on the app, including Award travel.

Lastly, we are always interested in what you have to say about your Alaska travel experience. Please give us your feedback with Alaska Listens, our customer satisfaction survey. Like all of these features, you can find it in our app.

You can find additional information about the Alaska Airlines travel app by visiting alaskaair.com/mobile.

Thanks for sending us feedback at androidapp@alaskaair.com. We are listening and welcome your suggestions.
descriptionHTML:
Explore options, book trips, check in, and move easily through airports. Find all the flight information that matters to you, when it matters.

With our app you can book a flight, select a seat, or change your seats before you depart. We will get you through the airport faster with mobile check-in up to 24 hours before your flight. You can also save time by using our app as your boarding pass, no more kiosks or lines, just use your phone to get through the security check point at the airport.

Keep track of your flight information including flight schedule, boarding time, and airport gate changes. Share your travel itinerary with friends and family via email. Receive information about flight delays and more with push notifications.

When you’re at the airport you can keep an eye on First Class and Standby wait lists. You can change your plans to get on an earlier or later flight. We will also send you a notification, telling you if there’s an earlier flight available for you once you've arrived at the airport.

We also offer calendar integration for smartphones, so that you can add your travel information to your calendar. You can track your Mileage Plan™ balance and then use those miles towards flights you can buy on the app, including Award travel.

Lastly, we are always interested in what you have to say about your Alaska travel experience. Please give us your feedback with Alaska Listens, our customer satisfaction survey. Like all of these features, you can find it in our app.

You can find additional information about the Alaska Airlines travel app by visiting alaskaair.com/mobile.

Thanks for sending us feedback at androidapp@alaskaair.com. We are listening and welcome your suggestions.
summary: Travel light with our easy-to-use mobile app, the perfect flying companion.
recentChanges:
If you are signed into your account, you no longer need to sign in again when you book a flight. And we fixed some other bugs, too.

Thanks for your help finding bugs, and please keep sending us feedback at androidapp@alaskaair.com. We’re always listening!
comments: It's great when it works properly. It continues to show me available seats. After entering all my information, it says the seat is no longer available. When I go back to select another seat, once again, I have to enter ALL my info, select a seat that is "available" according to the app, just to find out it's not available. it happens again continuing to show the seats are available when they aren't. For convenience, it's NOT that convenient. Very frustrating and disappointing.

A clean and effective app for managing all of my flight check-ins. Only minor improvements needed. (1) Once checked in and on multi legs the app doesn't seem to know you've already done it. It shouldn't keep asking if I want to check in when the check-in is complete. (2) It can be a bit slow waiting for the pinwheel to stop processing. Sometimes you wonder if it got stuck.

I rely on this app for most all of my travel (since Alaska has so many flights out of PDX - Portland, Oregon)...that I'm flying Alaska almost exclusively. It makes the check in and TSA so much nicer (with digital boarding passes and so much more that integrates with your mobile device... For example, you can easily add the flight info to your calendar, check - in and change seats, make flight changes when necessary, etc.). I think they've done a good job with the app.

Wonderful Application, mileage tracking, booking and finding flights. Hotel and car rentals, check-in and your boarding pass; all on your phone. check on your flight schedule and updates, can be abit late sometimes, especially in Seattle. The gates jump around, the application helps. Would have five stars, but I have had to run

App was easy to use but wish they would explain carry on baggage long before I was checking in . You have a change in carry on size that people should be aware of right from the start before checking in on the app..something I was scrambling at the last minute to do....also so good selection for a 6 hour flight sucks. Almost everything is crackers and cheese...no real food

title: TourBar - Chat, Meet & Travel
description:
TourBar is a travel dating app. It is a chance to find friends worldwide, visit a place of your dream, meet your soulmate, find a travel partner or a local guide when you are traveling. Download Tourbar today and start travelling together!
•	Wherever you are going, choose from plenty of cool, friendly travel buddies to help you feel the real thing. 
•	Plan trip together, shop, go out, eat, explore beaches or nature, or just hang out.
•	Visit your dream destinations and receive adventure travel companions where you are. It’s safe, easy, and takes just seconds.
•	Find your travel mates for backpacking, an upcoming business trip, convention or unite with new friends for a short break away. 
•	Whether you are interested in dating with Asian, Arabic, European, Russian, South or North American people, you will find plenty of profiles. Meet new people, enjoy unique travel and cultural experience.
•	Also you can meet the most beautiful women and handsome men from all over the world, make international friends or even find your love not stirring out of the house.
Your most awesome vacation starts right here with Tourbar!

London, England, SE1 9QR
recentChanges:
James: Wow! Tourbar Premium is free! And you look wonderful in the photo!
Katherine: Thank you! Hope you will enjoy TourBar with free Premium :)
comments: Terrible experience! Without my consent, I have been charged 2199/week by tourbar through Google play. I never used the trial version by myself. Listen, i wouldn't mind a subscription but that has to be by my choice not by deceit. Inspite of repeated request of refund of my money which was charged incorrectly, this app support did not respond 😡. If I don't get money refund asap, I am going to complain to court and will sue ur app.

Bizarre. I cannot believe this app would ever be recommended for people to find travel partners! The fact you have the option to select whether you want your partner to pay for you entire holiday and can filter via 'height and build' means I wouldn't be surprised if 1.this app is mostly used by escorts and 2. if its used for human trafficking. The only 'matches' I was presented with was one of the creepiest lists of men I've ever bl***y seen. Weird.

Worst experience. I can't even reply to the peoples who text me. And not able to start the ' just 7 days' trial without payment options. Developers, First i need try this app for somedays. After that if i don't like this app and cant cancel the subscription.. my money will be gone! Please make it trial without any payment option.

Canceld trial after 10mins. Maybe make the app send messages for 24h or 7 days without mutual likes. Its a good was to market your product. Thanks anyway. App looked good. UPDATE: Used the trial, i am able message now and get full potential from this app. Really good app, people are legit, if someone is fake, u are informed person has been removed. One thing though, can you guys add the option to look theough different image folders on Android and there is a scroll issue in images fold Android

Except for the paid subscription part, rest is all good. There's still a whole lot of room for the app to improvise in terms of the speed of loading pages and the features to communicate with friends!

title: Thrillophilia - World’s Best Travel Experiences
description:
Be There, Do That!

The Thrillophilia Mobile Application brings you curated tours and activities, signature travel experiences and thrilling adventures, all at one place.

•A unique online tours and travel app.

•Explore 10000+ travel experiences in 25+ countries.

•Connecting with 5000+ suppliers globally.

Who are we?

Thrillophilia is one of the pioneering mobile apps to discover hand-picked travel destinations, well-crafted itineraries and wonderful holiday plans.

•Plan your vacation in the best manner.

•Premium verified partners.

•Get lifetime experiences with memories to cherish forever.

•Travel to places and taste adventure like never before with Thrillophilia. Adventure sports, nature walks, sightseeing tours and weekend getaways, explore all on the mobile app today.

Mobile App Features

•Book tours and activities smoothly. Explore the season’s freshest experiences.
 •Discover things to do and holiday plans in your region. Short weekend getaways, sightseeing trips and a lot more.
•Scout for offbeat travel destinations on our online tours and travel app.

•Explore the wide variety of travel experiences on the app. Adventurous, peaceful, romantic, trekking, sports, fitness activities and more.

Benefits Of The App

With multiple exciting benefits, Thrillophilia mobile app is designed to furnish exclusive benefits to its customers:

•Save up to 50% while booking with the ‘App Only Deals’. Get easy access to travel itineraries with single click.

 •Read thousands of reviews of real travelers on the app before booking.

 •Find places by your interest, region, season and budget by using the geo-tag feature. Backpacking trips, luxury vacations and a lot more, personalize your travel experience fully.

 •Enjoy a fully secure payment gateway on the mobile app with electronic confirmed booking voucher.

 •Instant booking with suppliers in real-time defines the smooth book-ability. Get inspired to travel more.

 •Invite your friends to download the Thrillophilia mobile app and enjoy referral discounts on your next booking.

 •Check history for travel bookings, payment and related details easily.

 •Browse tours, activities and experiences all over the country with the ‘Far’ feature. Scroll to see a list of trending activities happening in your city.

 •Thrillophilia mobile app successfully caters to major destinations across India and worldwide. Explore things to do, plan a family vacation and discover unique travel experiences in Mumbai, Bangalore, Delhi, Manali, Ladakh, Coorg, Wayanad, Chikmagalur, Andaman & Nicobar, Pondicherry, Sakleshpur, Dandeli, Munnar, Kerala, Rajasthan, Sikkim, Darjeeling, Goa, Konkan among many others.

•Discover curated tours and activities for backpackers, couples, working professionals, students, budget travelers, families and adventure junkies.
