comments: This is a great app that helped me to visit taj mahal and delhi attractions without a tour guide, Try it you would definitely love it!

Overall experience is good. Two things I need to mention: 1) when you download your, sometimes it download previous one instead of downloading which I'm currently observing. 2) when it plays content bright pixel start blinking on top of the screen. Why?

Used this program to post up our QCT Miami Daily City Tour and QCT Miami Black Heritage Tour in several segments. Once I watched the tutorials and worked with it over a period of time it became easier and easier to publish my tours, make changes/updates, and even add multiple languages and various voices to narrate.

Time consuming with limited content. May be a glitch but when I search I get several tours not available in english even though default language is set to english. Abit of time wasted when tour names are the site name.

wonderful idea! good implementation! can you add autoplay no gps mode so that one can listen the whole tour in a row sitting on a plane without manually selecting next point? Hack: share bluetooth in-ear with your mate.

title: eDreams: Book cheap flights and travel deals
description:
Thinking about travelling? Are you looking for a cheap flight? Download our app and make the trip of your dreams! Book your cheap flight using the code APP10 and save 10$. We will also do the check-in for you, as soon as it is available, so you only have to worry about enjoying your trip.

Our eDreams travel app is the best rated in the travel industry; it has more than 2 million reviews and 18 million users! We'll take care of everything: Finding cheap flights, showing you the best hotels and other accommodations for your stay, negotiating great deals on your rental car or arranging your ride from the airport to your destination. We've got you covered!

✈️ Cheap flights ✈️

Find cheap flights among our more than 600 airlines, for one way, return or multi-city!
Our wide variety of flights offers you from long distance flights to cheap low cost flights with airlines such as Ryanair, Easyjet, British Airways, United Airlines, Air Europa and more. Book your flights with us and you will be able to download your boarding passes directly from the app, in addition to tracking the status of any flight in real time. You will find the ideal flight and tickets at the cheapest price in our travel app.

🏰 Hotels 🏰

Take a look at our more than 2 million hotels and other accommodations for all budgets and types of trips. Search, book and compare hotel offers very easily.
You can book hotels like Melià Hotels and Resorts, Marriott, Eurostars, NH, Catalonia Hotels & Resorts and much more. Cancellation is free if you change your plans. We also offer discounts of up to 40% less in hotels if you book a flight with us.

🚗 Car rental 🚗

Do you want to complete your booking with a car rental? We offer cars from companies such as Hertz, Avis, Europcar, Alamo, Budget and up to 800 car rental agencies. Rent a car anytime, anywhere and travel at your own pace.

Sounds good, right? And that's not all!
Our travel app not only offers you cheap flights, hotel deals, and car rentals for your trips ... download the app and:

🎫 Order your boarding passes for all your flights, and we will check-in as soon as it is available
✈️ follow the status of any flight in real time with our new flight tracker feature
🔔 Create an account and receive real time flight status notifications: gate numbers, baggage belts, delays or cancellations and more
🔎 Check your flight itineraries, booking references or baggage allowances in the My Trips section, even without an internet connection!
🏛️ download our free travel guides and discover what to do at your destination, even if you don't have an internet connection

eDreams helps you to  find the best deals on flights, hotels and car rentals. Search, compare and book flight + hotel tickets in our travel app to enjoy a 40% discount.

We strive every day to make your travel dreams come true. If you had a positive experience with our app, would you mind rating us with 5 stars in the Play Store? Thank you!

Follow us:
https://www.facebook.com/eDreams
https://twitter.com/eDreams_en

comments: It's the worse platform ever I booked my flight. I double checked before putting my card information, no charge for insurance and assistance, the price was ok. I put the card information and buy and afterwards I got the mail with higher price. I checked again and did another book more to find out what happened. Because I got screenshot of the price. And I realized when you put the card information they add 90 USD for using the platform just one second before click buy. It's insane don't use this

Booking is easy and flights are cheap, but customer service is inexistent, impossible to talk to someone, the word "refund" not to be found anywhere, the chat with the bot leads you in circles with an infinite series of "you've been queued" "sorry if all our agents are busy" "anything else i can do for you?" They make it so difficult to even get an answer, that the clear intention is to tire you to the point you give up. Thai Airways cancelled my flight, make it easier to be refunded. Simple.
It's booked so well. But the fares it displays before filling in the details it increases after the process. I don't like it at all.

I booked flight to Tblisi using edreams. The booking was fine and i got the confirmation,everything was ok. But as the airline cancelled the flight, i tried to call them for cancellation(no email for customer service), always getting busy pre recorded announcement.

Bunch of hidden fees. Buyer beware. Edit: On top of the hidden fees, the site it says it charges your local currency, for me it was CAD and on the site during the purchase it said CAD. BUT when I looked at my credit card statement it turns out it was charged in USD. OK so I sent in a ticket on their website, it said they would have someone get back to me in a few days. Been about 2 weeks now with nothing. If I could give lower than 1 star here I would. Buyer beware.

title: Fly Delta
description:
Welcome to Fly Delta, Delta’s award-winning Android app that makes travel easier than ever before. 

Planning Your Trip
•	Shop and book domestic and international flights
•	Track and pay for upgrades using your SkyMiles®
•	Manage travel preferences and payment methods
•	Save a companion to your profile
•	Need Help? Chat with one of our agents via Live Chat messaging
Use at the Airport
•	”Today” has everything you need for your day of travel 
•	Check in to your flight and receive your digital boarding pass
•	”Feed” gives you flight updates and gate change notifications
•	Use Airport Maps to navigate through the airport
•	View your place on the upgrade/standby list
•	Scan your passport during check-in
•	View, change or upgrade your seat
•	Reserve Preferred Seats in the bulkhead or aisle
•	Access boarding pass offline
•	Pay for and track your checked bags
•	Add Trip Extras like a Wi-Fi pass or Mileage Booster
•	Monitor flight status and read details about our fleet and partners
•	Rebook canceled flights or missed connections
During & After Your Flight
•	Get real-time bag tracking alerts
•	Map your flight en route
•	Find Delta Sky Club® info 
•	Store and use mobile drink vouchers

The Fly Delta app for Android and delta.com are always free to use on Delta's Wi-Fi-enabled flights. Visit delta.com/app for more information.

comments: The app worked great for awhile, but now I cant even look into booking a flight. If you put in an airport in the from and to sections, it stays blank. The number one feature, being able to book or check out potential rates and prices, is unusable. The app was never great, but if it fails to perform its primary function, then it is trash. Just use the website.

I have the same general issues that most people have had. It loses trips just about every time I travel. When I try to reenter my info it can't find the trip at all. It also carries over to the website so luckily I screen shot my boarding passes as soon as i get them. Awesome idea, terrible execution.

This app worked great until recently. My phone crashes whenever I try to open this app now and even locks my phone up to the point of needing a hard reset. Once I uninstalled it, my phone works fine. Guess I'll have to keep in uninstalled until the issues are resolved as I'd rather have a working phone. Samsung S20 Ultra+ 5G on AT&T

It never works!!!! Everytime I attempt to open the app just shuts down. Which defeats the whole purpose of the app. I can't book flights, I can't check-in, I can't use to scan my tickets which means I know have to have a paper ticket. I can't do ANYTHING!!! I have updated, I have uninstalled and reinstalled, nothing works! Someone please fix because this is crazy and very inconvenient.

Generally 'stale', not dynamic app - fails at giving passengers up tp date info. Ex1; Does not provide or update gate information (even 30min from departure time). Ex2: cannot change flight for cancelation (though email points you to app to do so). Ex3: boarding card often reverts back to "check in" after you've done so - board pass unreliable when you need it.

title: Japan Travel Guide in English with map
description:
Traveling to Japan? Discover everything that Japan has to offer with this free guide in English with maps and offline lists. The best restaurants, hotels, activities and monuments in Japan.

Japan has much to offer. Visiting its monuments, wandering its streets, meeting the people and learning their customs is a must. That's why you have this guide toJapan, created using photos and recommendations from real travelers. And remember that you can save your lists offline. Japan is waiting for you!

title: Japan Official Travel App
description:
Find reliable information and navigation for your trip to Japan.
“Japan Official Travel App” is the official smartphone app provided by JNTO, delivering up-to-date information about traveling in Japan for a safe and comfortable journey. 

App Overview:
-Travel guide contents
-Route Search and navigation

About the Features:
[Travel guide contents]
Regularly updated articles and tourist spot information, maps, and route search features help you plan and travel your journey across Japan. Transit search is compatible with Japan Rail Pass.

Explore Japan through content-rich articles introducing big cities to small rural towns and events. The articles are selected by JNTO for the app to enrich your journey.

The app contains basic information about Japan that may be helpful for tourists, such as general rules and manners, medical assistance, and embassy contact details. Links to helpful services also provided.

[Route search]
-The app navigates you from your preferred point of departure to your destination.
-Search covers all modes of public transport (trains including JR and subway lines, airplanes, taxis, and ferries), and is compatible with Japan Rail Pass
-Provides useful information such as the most convenient carriage number for train transit, platform information and station lists.
-Search directly from a zoomable interactive train map
-Allows you to save searched routes. You can also see them while offline.

[Offline Spot Search]
-Search offline for the following spots:
*Free Wi-Fi hotspots
*Tourist Information Center
*Station
*Hospitals

[Notice]
-At the time of your initial access, we ask users to participate in a survey, which is used for enhancing tourism experience in Japan. This survey is optional, and you will be able to use the app without answering them.
-This app uses GPS in the background for enhancing user experience.

recentChanges:
Updated offline spot data.
Minor fixes.
comments: Super useful and easy to read UI to find transit routes. There is a JR option to search for routes and you can view the timetable incase you miss your train. I have also showed the routes provided by this app to employees to reserve Shinkansen tickets.

Overall a very helpful app that provides detailed instructions and routes. Very useful for those with a JR pass since it indicates which suggested routes are JR only. One suggestion would be to improve how ticket prices are indicated; it can be confusing at times to figure out the exact fare required for a trip that requires transfers.
Easy to use and very informative, really helped plan our trip.
Great app for route planning with the JR pass. Could show more info when you search.
Extremely useful and well done app. Everyone who is traveling to Japan should have it installed.

title: Ready To Travel
description:
Dream big and make your travel adventures happen on the revitalised Ready To Travel Mobile App! 

Have a bucket list of destinations to check off? Bring your dreams to life, whether it’s cruising to Alaska to see the orcas or humpback whales, or sleeping under the stars in a snowy glass igloo. 

This collaborative itinerary planner is your one-stop travel assistant to keep your plans on track. 

• Your personal organiser –> Save your flight bookings and trip reservations in your Travel Folder. 
• Gather your tribe –> Keep it real by asking your friends to plan trips together on the app.
• Save for later –> Get tips for interesting activities to do, places to go and save them, just in case.
• Budget for fun –> Use the in-app calculator and currency converter to find out if your budgeted travel expense is sufficient. 
• Get essentials –> Receive information on travel advisory and weather. Enhance your travels with services including Airport Lounge, Meet and Greet, Pocket WiFi, and Travel Insurance. 

*Pocket WIFI and Travel Insurance products are currently for Singaporean/PR outbound travellers departing from Singapore. Free delivery for Pocket WiFi is applicable only to residents in Singapore.

Visit www.readytotravel.com for more details.

comments: It does not support my trip that covers a few countries in Europe. Lucky I did not waste too much time on this app. And instead of stating the city I would depart from, I was asked to choose a country. Too general. This app is not for me.
The performance in app is lagging Instruction is not clear in adding iterniary. Should also incorporate more flexibility
Stupid app. Can't even login & create new account. First step is a failure
Im using s10+, this app clearly need to improve. I couldnt select my origin country (asked me to select, but the options didnt show).

The app has detailed information on each destinations which I am excited about but later realised, I was unable to create my own trip. (Cuz every time I click create trip, it brings me back to the travelling sites. But when I wanna add it to my trip, I was unable to do so,stating that my trip has not been created.) pls help.

title: Lambus | Travel Planner
description:
Lambus is your new All-in-One travel app: Everything you need for your next trip combined in one platform. Manage expenses, waypoints, travel documents, photos and more of your trip with Lambus. We assist you before, during and after your trip, so you focus on having a great time during your travels! Plan either alone or together - Lambus works either way!

# Plan your next adventure

So much world. So little time. That's why it's important to not spend unnecessary time on complicated route planning. Fina new waypoints and nearby places and add them to your route - route planning has never been so easy. Or just let us inspire you to new goals!

# Import your itinerary

Planning a hiking / bicycle / motorcycle trip? Import your detailed .gpx route into Lambus easily and it will be available for everyone in your trip. Alternatively, plan a new itinerary!

# Bring order to the travel documents

No more confusing lists, tables and missing e-mails. Collect your travel documents in one place only: Lambus! This way, all fellow travelers can access it at any time - even offline!

# Expenses: Having an eye on your private and shared expenses

With Lambus you simply keep track of your expenses, even in the group. The best part: We also do the cost-splitting for you and you can even balance your costs within the app!

# Manage your private and shared notes

Regardless of whether you want to share your Airbnb PIN code with your group or just manage your passport number securely: Lambus is able to satisfy your needs.

# Get inspired

Be inspired by our curated trips, e.g. "West Coast USA Tour" or "Thailand May 2020" and many more!
descriptionHTML:
Lambus is your new All-in-One travel app: Everything you need for your next trip combined in one platform. Manage expenses, waypoints, travel documents, photos and more of your trip with Lambus. We assist you before, during and after your trip, so you focus on having a great time during your travels! Plan either alone or together - Lambus works either way!

# Plan your next adventure

So much world. So little time. That's why it's important to not spend unnecessary time on complicated route planning. Fina new waypoints and nearby places and add them to your route - route planning has never been so easy. Or just let us inspire you to new goals!

# Import your itinerary

Planning a hiking / bicycle / motorcycle trip? Import your detailed .gpx route into Lambus easily and it will be available for everyone in your trip. Alternatively, plan a new itinerary!

# Bring order to the travel documents

No more confusing lists, tables and missing e-mails. Collect your travel documents in one place only: Lambus! This way, all fellow travelers can access it at any time - even offline!

# Expenses: Having an eye on your private and shared expenses

With Lambus you simply keep track of your expenses, even in the group. The best part: We also do the cost-splitting for you and you can even balance your costs within the app!

# Manage your private and shared notes

Regardless of whether you want to share your Airbnb PIN code with your group or just manage your passport number securely: Lambus is able to satisfy your needs.

# Get inspired

Be inspired by our curated trips, e.g. "West Coast USA Tour" or "Thailand May 2020" and many more!
summary: Manage expenses, waypoints, travel documents, photos and notes within one app!
recentChanges:
• Select past dates when creating trips and waypoints. This was requested many times so far and we listened!
• Import not only whole trips from "Google My Places" but also single waypoints from "Google Maps". Just hit "Share" from the waypoint you want to import and select Lambus in the list of apps. We take take of the rest!
• Minor updates on the COVID-19 (Corona) warning. Please stay save during this crisis!
comments: So far so good in pre planning stage. However, when adding waypoint I wished there's an option that prompt us that we have added 'the place' before and if we like to add again. I now unfortunately have to delete each one that I double save as way point. Also, it would be nice to be able to add option to categorise our waypoint for example by country. And also if the name of the country can come below the city's name. We are not all familiar with these places.

The invitation flow is bad.. The link I got told me to open the app, hit the + button and put in the code. No link to the app on that page, no deep linking to just auto handle adding the trip. Some really low hanging fruit that would make the initial experience wayyyy better. After I downloaded the app manually, there was no plus sign fab until she had already added me manually to the trip by username, then the fab appeared. Overall beautiful design though! I really want this app to improve! :)
Exactly what I've been looking for! This is a fantastic app that will allow you to simply plan every detail of your vacation.
Such an amazing app to help set things up with a group of friends! Makes things so much easier
Awesome app, easy to use with great and helpful feature!

title: InviteTravel
description: InviteTravel the app that helps you find like-minded travel companions with whom you can visit your dream destinations together. Browse members according to your budget and destination. Invite Travel suggests members that match your budget and want to travel to the same destination as you. You'll be able to browse members as well as check their profiles. You can do that based on your desired destination, age, gender, and budget. Once you find a potential travel companion who matches your criteria, start a conversation, share your future travel plans and invite them to travel together.

title: Wikivoyage - Offline Travel Guide
description:
Wikivoyage offline travel guide: Tourism information for almost 30.000 destinations all over the world.

Wherever you go, get tips about:
* How to get from the airport to the city
* What are the must-see
* What to eat/drink, including a selection of restaurants and bars
* Where to sleep, depending on your budget
* Local customs, how to stay safe, everything you need to know
* Phrasebook

Usable without an Internet connection. Better than unreliable WiFi or expensive roaming. Complete with region/city maps and pictures. Powered by Kiwix https://kiwix.org/

Wikivoyage is written by volunteers, it is the "Wikipedia of travel guides" and is run by the same non-profit as Wikipedia (Wikimedia). If you notice an error or want to add touristic information, please edit the relevant article at https://en.wikivoyage.org, your contribution will be included in the next release. Thank you!

Application size: 800 MB. 
For Europe-specific content (and a smaller app), have a look at Wikivoyage Europe

title: TravelTriangle - Holiday Travel & Tour Packages
description:
TravelTriangle - Your Ideal Holiday Planner 
	
Connecting more than 40 lac happy travelers to 650+ verified agents, TravelTriangle, is an online marketplace which empowers the travelers with customized holiday packages. You can avail the best holiday deals and book cheap holiday packages to more than 65 destinations in India & abroad.
 
Offering enticing international tour packages & domestic tour packages, TravelTriangle encourages you to customize your own holiday travel packages. Be it international holiday packages, domestic holiday packages, international honeymoon packages, or domestic honeymoon packages, you can book a personalized travel package through this Travel App.
 
Whether it’s a honeymoon, a family or a solo trip, you can find packages for all kinds of holidays. Inclusive of flight tickets, hotels, meals & transfers, this Travel App offers a unique experience in tours and travels by providing multiple budget-friendly travel deals from handpicked agents. 
 
From cheap domestic flights to online hotel bookings, TravelTriangle thrives to craft memorable holiday experiences. Whether you’re looking for places to visit near Delhi, or to explore any international destination, enjoy the personalized & easy holiday booking experience with TravelTriangle.
 
How To Book A Trip Via TravelTriangle App?
 
• Let us know about your holiday plans & our top 3 agents from that destination will offer you multiple quotes that fit in your budget
• Customize your travel packages, in terms of whether you want to book air tickets, hotels, attractions & activities that fit in your budget
• Pay in easy installments, get your money safe guarantee, and enjoy a hassle-free holiday booking experience
 
Key Features:
 
• Verified Travel Agents - Our destination experts connect you with the top agents which are handpicked post multiple quality checks who then offer multiple quotes to you for holiday packages in your budget
 
• Customized Packages - Enjoy your journey, your way. Customize your tour package to perfection as per your requirements
 
• Hassle-Free Holiday Booking - We make sure there are no detours in your journey through our in-house expert guidance, who are available 24x7 to assist you throughout your journey
 
• Pay In Installments - Pay in easy installments as per your convenience & chase the pre-holiday blues with TravelTriangle’s 100% Money Safe Guarantee
 
Best Selling Packages

International Honeymoon Packages: Mauritius honeymoon packages, Cambodia, Seychelles honeymoon packages, Bhutan honeymoon packages, Maldives honeymoon packages, Bali honeymoon packages, Singapore honeymoon packages, Hong Kong Disneyland package, Europe honeymoon
 
Domestic Honeymoon Packages: Himachal honeymoon package, Manali, Leh Ladakh honeymoon packages, Sikkim honeymoon packages, Kerala honeymoon packages, Andaman honeymoon
 
International Tour Packages: Singapore cruise package, cheap Thailand tour packages, Sri Lanka packages, Hong Kong Macau packages, Singapore Malaysia tour packages, Bali tour packages, Europe tour packages, Mauritius holiday packages, Maldives packages from Delhi, Europe trip packages, Thailand tourism packages, Maldives tourism packages from Mumbai, Cambodia tour packages, Seychelles packages from India
 
Domestic Tour Packages: Kerala tour packages with cheapest price from Delhi, Sikkim holiday packages, Darjeeling holiday packages, Uttarakhand tour packages, Kerala travel packages, Himachal tourism packages, Kerala vacation packages, Sikkim tourism packages, Ladakh package, Himachal Pradesh, Andaman tour packages, cheap Kerala sightseeing packages
 
 
For further queries, feedback or suggestions, contact us at 1800-123-5555 or write to us at customercare@traveltriangle.com

comments: Superb app. You got deals from min 3 agents. You discuss, analyse and choose the best suitable. The attractive thing is that this platform acts as mediator between you and agent so that the trust factor is added on in any deal. Agent won't generally misbehave because TT is watching him... Payment inatallments, tracking and instant update/notification about your installments!! Everything on a single screen... that's also one of the wow things of the app as well as TT. Best exp till date.

Very bad experience with travel triangle. We booked a package with 4 star hotels for our Kerala trip but they provided hotels which are not even worth of 1 star. Just a waste of money. They are simply making profits. Before making the payments we will get multiple calls but during the trip if we get any issue they will not respond.

Poor... We had poor experience when we booked our Himachal trip iN December 2019 when the agent cheated us and booked an inferior Hotel at Manali wheb their invoice indicated a different hotel... We have already complained about this a thousand times a d requested for a refund... Travel Triangle sided with the agent and took thier side... Will never book in your pathetic app again
Quotes for all locations, domestic or international, are available instantly from multiple travel agents who are ready to customize packages. Am a frequent user and would recommend.

Dont install the app, these people are frauds, they took away 150000 rupees from my bank account. For which I am having a legal battle with them. This App steels your personal data as well. I have staryed receiving calls from different travel related businesses after installing this app. Uninstall the app and never do business with these fraud people and company.

title: wordoftravel: Travel Blogs & Travel Tips
description:
Are you in search of the best travel app?
A trip planner & travel blog app which gives you the best travel tips to make your next trip better?

You need wordoftravel

wordoftravel makes it easier to plan your next trip. Get the best travel app to research destinations and get travel tips from like-minded travelers. Discover travel blogs to follow and search over 15,000 travel blog posts packed with inspiring stories and informative travel tips. Travel smarter – travel with wordoftravel!

🌎FIND USEFUL TRAVEL BLOGS BY LOCATION
▪️ Type in the name of your next travel destination and find out tons of useful travel tips and suggestions in the form of travel blogs and travel tips.

▪️ Search for travel blog posts by location, keywords and your individual travel style. Using the wordoftravel app you can find travel bloggers who travel as you do, whether your dream is sliding down a volcano in Patagonia or sipping great coffee in Melbourne!

The best part? 
▪️ Our travel app gives you tips and blogs with a variety of useful information, from travel guides and best places to visit, to travel itineraries, accommodation recommendations, budget travel advice and sustainable travel tips to make your trip a success.

📲FOLLOW BLOGGERS
The wordoftravel app lets you follow bloggers that write content you love. Whether it is solo travelers, budget travelers or even luxury travel, you can discover some amazing bloggers on our travel app.

Create your own personal travel feed to be notified of new posts from your favorite travel bloggers and save your favorite posts to read when you are offline. 


📅PLAN SMARTER
Save precious holiday time and money using the trip planner features of wordoftravel. Create travel lists with collections of blog posts, tips and other travel resources to help plan your next trip and invite your travel buddies to collaborate on trip planning. Spend more time enjoying your vacation  and less time planning, no matter the location you visit!

💡SHARE YOUR OWN TRAVEL TIPS
Use wordoftravel to keep track of your best travel tips and favourite places to visit and share them with your friends and travel buddies or choose to help others plan their trip by sharing your tips publicly.

🤝CONNECT WITH TRAVEL BUDDIES
Create a network of travel buddies that you meet on the road so you can quickly and easily share your travel research and tips and see where you can meet up on your journey.

✈️WHY WORDOFTRAVEL
- easy to use
- 15k+ helpful travel blogs
- search by location or keyword
- travel tips for each location
- download blogs and content for offline usage
- create travel list for smarter trip planning
- follow bloggers and create your personal feed
- connect with travel buddies and share plans and tips
- travel blogs open within the app to save time and enhance reading experience

Now it’s time to travel smarter forever..
Download the wordoftravel app and start planning for your next trip today!

title: minube: travel planner & guide
description:
​★🏆 New! minube enters the apps hall of fame. The Google Team rewards minube with the Editors' Choice Badge in recognition of its quality, excellent design and innovative functionalities.★​

​★🏆 2015: minube is named one of Google's 50 Best Apps of the year, for the third year in a row.★​

​★🏆 2014: minube is named one of Google's 50 Best Apps of the year, for the second year in a row.★​

​★🏆 2013: minube is named one of Google's 50 Best Apps of the year.★​

minube is travel planning app & travel organizer that lets you find vacation ideas, save favorite places in lists, and create your own travel itinerary & tourist guide.

Minube is an app that lets you discover the best places around the world, all recommended by real travelers. Discover interesting places to visit in your own city or create your own personalized travel guides and save them to use offline during your vacation. The best part is that when your trip is done, the minube app will automatically create beautiful photo galleries of all the places you visited.

Here’s how the minube app can help you with your travels:

Deciding on where to take your next vacation
On minube, you’ll find over 2 million tourist attractions, restaurants, and hotels around the world, all recommended by our community of over 1.5 million real travelers. Find expert lists by topic like the world’s best scuba diving locations or the cheapest cities to visit in Europe, or use our Inspiration tool to discover destinations using filters like color, distance from home, and more.

 Planning your trip
Once you’ve decided on where to go, minube will help you unlock the best of the destination. Discover lists created by expert locals with themes like the best tapas restaurants in Barcelona or the most spectacular castles to visit in Germany. Or, read recommendations from real travelers and save your favorite places to see, eat, and stay into your own travel guides which you can then download and use offline during your vacation.

 During your trip
The minube app can also help you during the trip itself. Use the app to discover restaurants and tourist attractions near your location, see the exact location of places you want to visit, or discover recommendations and lists about the place you’re visiting. Don’t forget that you can create your own travel guides and use them offline wherever you are.

 When you’ve finished traveling
Finally, your trips don’t end when you get home. Minube helps you relive your favorite travel moments again and again! If you have GPS activated on your phone’s camera, the minube app can detect all of the photos from your trip and organize them into beautiful photo galleries complete with maps and travel dates. Not only is it a lovely reminder of your trip, it’s also perfect to share with your friends and family.

Want to learn more about minube? 

Follow us on Facebook → https://www.facebook.com/minube
Follow us on Twitter → https://twitter.com/minubeapp

Why do we need these permissions? U+1F64B

Identity: So you can create an account and enter into minube and enjoy a more thorough travel-planning experience. 

Location: To find tourist attractions, restaurants, and hotels near you and get directions to local points of interest. 

Internet: To connect to the minube platform and discover thousands of new places and destinations around the world.
descriptionHTML:
​★🏆 New! minube enters the apps hall of fame. The Google Team rewards minube with the Editors' Choice Badge in recognition of its quality, excellent design and innovative functionalities.★​

​★🏆 2015: minube is named one of Google's 50 Best Apps of the year, for the third year in a row.★​

​★🏆 2014: minube is named one of Google's 50 Best Apps of the year, for the second year in a row.★​

​★🏆 2013: minube is named one of Google's 50 Best Apps of the year.★​

minube is travel planning app & travel organizer that lets you find vacation ideas, save favorite places in lists, and create your own travel itinerary & tourist guide.

Minube is an app that lets you discover the best places around the world, all recommended by real travelers. Discover interesting places to visit in your own city or create your own personalized travel guides and save them to use offline during your vacation. The best part is that when your trip is done, the minube app will automatically create beautiful photo galleries of all the places you visited.

Here’s how the minube app can help you with your travels:

Deciding on where to take your next vacation
On minube, you’ll find over 2 million tourist attractions, restaurants, and hotels around the world, all recommended by our community of over 1.5 million real travelers. Find expert lists by topic like the world’s best scuba diving locations or the cheapest cities to visit in Europe, or use our Inspiration tool to discover destinations using filters like color, distance from home, and more.

Planning your trip
Once you’ve decided on where to go, minube will help you unlock the best of the destination. Discover lists created by expert locals with themes like the best tapas restaurants in Barcelona or the most spectacular castles to visit in Germany. Or, read recommendations from real travelers and save your favorite places to see, eat, and stay into your own travel guides which you can then download and use offline during your vacation.

During your trip
The minube app can also help you during the trip itself. Use the app to discover restaurants and tourist attractions near your location, see the exact location of places you want to visit, or discover recommendations and lists about the place you’re visiting. Don’t forget that you can create your own travel guides and use them offline wherever you are.

When you’ve finished traveling
Finally, your trips don’t end when you get home. Minube helps you relive your favorite travel moments again and again! If you have GPS activated on your phone’s camera, the minube app can detect all of the photos from your trip and organize them into beautiful photo galleries complete with maps and travel dates. Not only is it a lovely reminder of your trip, it’s also perfect to share with your friends and family.

Want to learn more about minube?

Follow us on Facebook → https://www.facebook.com/minube
Follow us on Twitter → https://twitter.com/minubeapp

Why do we need these permissions? U+1F64B

Identity: So you can create an account and enter into minube and enjoy a more thorough travel-planning experience.

Location: To find tourist attractions, restaurants, and hotels near you and get directions to local points of interest.

Internet: To connect to the minube platform and discover thousands of new places and destinations around the world.
summary: The app for discovering incredible places and saving your best travel memories.

comments: app is good but unable to download offline map data , it froze in mid of download , kindly sort out this issue
help a lot when you visit a place for the first time
cannot download the offline guides, it hangs on after a while...
good

First they ask to access ALL your photos, even private ones. That's a bad 
privacy violation. Then the app automatically builds photo album about 
places where we've been (all, no possibility to select, it means giving all 
gps data to them, without having an account!) and after creating an 
account, these albums disappear. Where is my data now? Stored with no name? 
Then it asks to review places which I never heard. A well-done review takes 
time and time is money. Not to mention if we add good photos of the place. 
They ask this service for free, or better, in change of "the chance" of 
wining 200$ in travel services. Which is nothing. Not least, the app 
continuously run in background, sucking resources and energy for nothing. I 
receive frequent notifications of it from the system. I'm sorry, but I 
don't understand the utility and benefits, maybe I'm missing something? Be 
careful before giving your data for nothing!

title: TourScanner - Compare Tours & Travel Activities
description:
TourScanner aggregates the world largest catalogue of skip-the-line tickets for attractions, city tours, guided visits, outdoor and sport activities, cooking classes, food tours, day trips, excursions, shows and much more. You can search from a large variety of things to do in popular cities, locations and holiday destinations abroad.

TourScanner’s search allows users to compare the prices from hundreds of booking sites in just a few clicks, including 300,000 tours, things to do and attractions in over 5,000 destinations. Type Paris or New York City in the search bar and you can find the right travel activity quickly and easily on TourScanner. Compare prices and let TourScanner help you finding the best price from thousands of deals.

title: tripwolf - Travel Guide & Map
description:
With over 10 million downloads worldwide, tripwolf is one of the most popular travel guide apps in the Google Play Store. We offer over 600 travel guides with premium content from Fodor’s Travel - including offline maps and a trip planner.

AT A GLANCE: WHY SHOULD YOU TRAVEL WITH TRIPWOLF?

✓ Over 600 travel guides - available in German, English, French, Spanish, Russian and Italian
✓ Sync your travel guides and maps on up to three devices
✓ Premium tips and photos from Fodor’s Travel and MARCO POLO as well as additional information from Yelp & Wikipedia
✓ Offline maps with attractions, restaurants, hotels, shops, bars, museums etc. as well as public transport options
✓ Routing via public transport with the help of Google Maps
✓ Trip Planner for your optimal trip preparation – including day planning and routes on the map
✓ Navigate on the map and see the best route on foot, by bike or by car
✓ Let us show you the way to the nearest attraction on your list on the map.
✓ Phrasebooks with over 200 phrases and words in 18 languages
✓ Book your tickets, tours, hotels and flights directly from the tripwolf travel app

——
IN DETAIL

OFFLINE MAPS
All 600+ travel guides are available for offline use after they are downloaded. This includes the offline maps, all texts, trips and photos. To book hotels, flights or tours for attractions, you need to have an active internet connection.

PREMIUM TRAVEL GUIDE
A free preview is available for all travel guides. After upgrading, you have access to the premium content with the most important attractions, hotels, restaurants, bars, museums and public transport options as well as the offline maps as well as a range of other features.

FODOR’S TRAVEL GUIDE CONTENT
Our travel guides contain insider tips from Fodor’s Travel and MARCO POLO. Detailed descriptions, opening hours, entrance fees and other information for all attractions, restaurants, museums etc. await you! Additionally, you’ll get a perfect overview on our maps.

PREPARE YOUR VACATION WITH THE TRIP PLANNER
Thanks to Trip Planner, you can put together all the details of your trip before, or even during, your journey. Add the most important points of interest, restaurants, shops, hotels and museums to your travel guide and you’ll get the complete route as an offline map. In addition, you can also optimise your route, letting the app automatically arrange your route by distance from your departure point (i.e. hotel).

‘NEAR ME NOW’ FILTER ON THE MAPS
Filter attractions, hotels, restaurants etc. which are near you directly on the map and save time during your next city trip. Even offline!

FIND THE BEST DEALS
Should you want to book your trip from the app, that’s not a problem. Find the cheapest city tours as well as budget hotels, tour tickets for the most exciting attractions and flight tickets directly in the tripwolf app. Discover the best tours in cities such as Palma, Istanbul, Brussels, Stockholm, Bangkok or Los Angeles.

QUALITY OF THE MAPS & CONTENT
The offline map is provided by OpenStreetMap and is continuously updated.

OUR TOP TRAVEL GUIDES
Our most popular travel guides with offline maps at the moment are city guides such as Rome, London, Barcelona, Amsterdam, Lisbon, Vienna, Paris, New York, Hamburg, Prague, Munich, Venice, Florence, Dublin and Copenhagen as well as country and region guides such as Thailand, Mallorca, Germany, Switzerland, Italy and Portugal.

tripwolf is a small team of travel lovers based in Vienna. We offer mobile travel guides with offline maps and a trip planner for over 600 destinations. If you have any problems with our app or would like to send us some feedback, drop us a line at support@tripwolf.com and we’ll get back to you asap! Happy travels!

comments: Excellent app. Love how it is updated constantly. Used it in Vegas last year. Will use it again in Arizona this year. I purchased the full app. Well worth it.

Good app with tons of features. Unfortunately I can't add custom places to my day plans like bus stops, transportation from the airport etc. (the pins just don't appear in my day plan). Also I don't see a way to save my travel documents in the trip. And it's a pitty that the app is full of bugs: map isn't loading, nothing happens when I press the plus button to add a place from the map, routes in the day plans are just no loading etc. Please fix, then it would be a great app
Excellent. Has everything you could need in city guides and trip planning.
This is a paid application with a useless price charge..bad experience not impressive less useful. Absolutely rubbish and worthless
I use this app since 2013. Good travel advices, usefully tool to plan your trip

title: Mark O'Travel: Where Have You Been?
description:
The one and only essential tool for a traveler. Create your own travel map marking states and regions where you've been!

The app is user friendly, and allows to:

comments: The best app of its kind. It has the official list of countries, plus other options. It's quick and light, no need for useless registration or stuff like that, easy customization. Worth supporting such a good job. Thanks for this app.
Easy to use, no frills app! The functionalities are just what i neeeded. However, I hope that the number of regions with maps would increase.
I really enjoy the set up and seeing the listing of the pieces of the world, tagging the places I traveled to and watching others use the map listing capabilities.

The app is good, better and more user friendly than any other sister app out there. It's nice to use and I like the different lists, but when will it be brought up to the same level as it is on Apple?
One of my favourite travel apps - not sure where the 205, 256, 266 and 278 come from though (the 193 + 2 and the 325 TCC are obvious).

title: KKday: Adventure Like a Local
description:
KKday is a travel e-commerce platform where you can get all your travel needs. Pick your destination and plan your journey with our variable selections. Choose from 20,000 experiences and travel essentials in over 80 countries and 500 cities worldwide.
 
What types of products/service KKday offers?
- Travel Essentials: pocket Wi-Fi, sim cards, airport transfers, JR Pass, train tickets and more 
- Attraction Tickets: Disneyland, Universal Studios, Taipei 101 Observatory, Everland, etc.
- Local Tours: day tours expertly designed by locals, cultural experiences, curated food spots
- Travel Bucket List: Sandboarding in Dubai, Skydiving in Australia, Northern Light viewing in Iceland, Hot Air Balloon experience in Angkor Wat

Our destination includes:
- Taiwan: Stroll through Jiufen Old Street to rewind film scenes in Spirit Away, see the city from the top of Taipei 101, take in mountainous scenery in Cingjing Farm or opt for a delicious meal at 1 Michelin star restaurant, Din Tai Fung
- Japan: Meet Minions in Universal Studios Japan,  join a Mt. Fuji tour and ride Kyoto Sagano’s scenic railroad train
- Korea: Laugh watching the iconic Nanta show, skip the line in Everland and relive K-drama scenes in Nami Island
- Thailand: Join a Thai cooking class, stroll Ayutthaya’s historic sites and cruise through Thailand’s iconic Chao Phraya River 
- America: Experience being on Top of the Rock in New York, photograph Grand Canyon’s geological wonders and take a helicopter ride over Niagara Falls 
- Australia: Skydive in stunning Yarra Valley,  witness rock formation of Twelve Apostles on Great Ocean Road tour 
- Global: Parasail along Boracay’s white shores, be awed by the artistry of Singapore’s Gardens by the Bay and cruise through Amsterdam’s photogenic streets

Our products/service are suitable for all types of travelers:
- Family with Kids: Discover your favorite cartoon characters and unwind all the happiness and laughter in  the magic land of Universal Studios, Disneyland,  Everland and other top theme parks
- Friends: try on a Hanbok with your bestie, travel to Thailand for an exhilarating bachelor party or have a night market food trip with your friends
- Honeymoon: Marvel at Iceland’s Aurora Borealis with your loved one or enjoy a gourmet dinner on a Seine River luxury cruise in Paris
- Backpacker: book all travel essentials in advance such as Wi-Fi, SIM cards, train tickets and enjoy KKday’s signature join-in tours all around the world 
- Family with elders: enjoy a private tour that departs from and drops off at your chosen hotel or accommodation for convenience

APP function:
- Online customer service: Contact our customer service anytime during your journey
- Instant booking: Receive your tickets and start your trip right away
- E-voucher: Skip the lines by simply showing your voucher for your journey
- Variable payment methods: Credit cards (VISA, JCB, Master card), LINE PAY, Google Play

Travel all around the world and plan your journey with KKday! Enjoy the most convenient trip planning experience with your travel expert.

KKday official website: https://www.kkday.com
Customer service: service@kkday.com

recentChanges: Hey traveler! This update includes minor bug fixes and performance improvements. Thanks for using the KKday app and we wish you happy travels :)
comments: Advertises erroneous and inaccurate information regarding one Trip that is being offered in this app and refund will take a lot of time. Agents are also not helpful, they will reply with templates. They won't provide concrete answers and will reply to you like an answering machine. Try other providers, like Klook. Never had a problem with them because they will honor their services, as advertised.
Great savings, but not so easy to use? First the promo code won't work, I had to redo all input many times. Finally worked!!! So happy!

Update to my last review. My payment was refunded after 24h of the payment. It would have been nice to know my order has failed instaid of leaving me guessing. CS was no help at all. Need to update your saved messages for new payment methodes. 1 extra star for the problem being resolved. Uninstalling.
Great to use! Great prices and user friendly! will use the app again and highly recommended :)
Good deals, especially in Taiwan, but the search function could be better (sorting by categories etc.)

title: STA Travel
description:
Get a room! 

Okay, we will. And a flight. And a tour. And we'll do it all from our mobile.
The STA Travel app will change the way you travel. Wherever you are in the world, you can now search, book and manage all your adventures on the road.

If you’re in the UK, USA, Australia or New Zealand you’ll be able to:
• Book hotels, hostels, day trips, tours and flights anywhere in the world
• Get recommendations of cool day trips and activities every time you change location
• Stay up to date with the latest travel safety alerts and check out our FAQs
• Safely store, share and manage your flights and bookings from your STA account
• Easily contact our Travel Experts or Customer Service teams 
• Head into the Messages app on iOS 10 to check out STA stickers.

If you’re in any other part of the world (where unfortunately the STA Travel Account isn’t available right now) you’ll be able to:
• Book hotels, hostels, day trips, tours and flights anywhere in the world
• Get recommendations of cool travel-type stuff to do every time you change location
• Never be stranded on the road, with same day hotel bookings and instant confirmation
• Share your travel experience without having to type a word. Head into the Messages app on iOS 10 to check out STA stickers.

Now UK customers (UK customers only for now) who have an STA Cashcard you can manage your card balance, check transactions, and block or un-block a card instantly. 

Start the Appventure and download it now. Or visit statravel.com for more details.

recentChanges:
What's New?

We’ve listened to your feedback and added FAQs plus Travel Safety Alerts. We've also added the ability for customers with an STA Travel Account (Available to limited countries only) to manage their booking from the app.

On top of that we've updated the design to make options easier to find, and fixed a few pesky bugs!

We'd love to get your feedback about the app itself, so please leave us a comment!
comments: Incredibly frustrating app. I'm trying to book an experience through the app but it crashes every time I try to put in my card details in checkout. I'm ready to go through someone else to get what I want
Literally useless for anyone who doesn't live in an English speaking country. Someone really needs to work on this app since it would have been quite useful.
Horrible app. Just downloaded it and before I could put possible dates in, the app shut down. I closed it and tried again and second time, shut down again. Third attempt, it wouldn't even open.
Can't view and of the flights or tours... App freezes or returns me to home screen
I have a booking I would have wanted to track and have updates on and even to use while abroad. This app has none of the functionality

title: 15toGO /Match People to Travel with & Book Trips
description:
15toGO is a social travel app and group tours marketplace where you can match with like-minded people, book hassle-free, and travel for less! 

In 3 easy steps you can completely change the way you travel:  
MATCH: Find your new travel buddies
BOOK: Choose experiences and book directly from the Local Tour Operators
TRAVEL: Travel together and explore the world with your friends and your new travel buddies

Social functionalities:
- Build the coolest globetrotter’s profile of yours
- Add your interests and match with like-minded people to travel with
- Fill your Travel map – pin all the destinations you have been to and see how many you have left to conquer the world ☺ 
- Make Travelships – find new friends and create friendships all around the world, share experiences and why not even travel together to your next dream destination
- Communicate with your travel buddies and plan where to go next or chat with your new friends to receive tips and recommendations for a country that they have already visited
- Share your future trips and inspiring photos with your travel buddies 
- Upload pictures directly from your Instagram profile within seconds
- Get inspired by other cool profiles, give a GO (like) and comment on other users' activities

Travel functionalities:
- Choose between different destinations and activities of many Local Tour Operators around the world – from skiing in the French Alps to diving in Egypt or relaxing on the tropical beach in Thailand – all of that is possible with 15toGO
- Find people and trips that match your interests. Choose from sightseeing trips, cultural experiences, diving, hiking, ski and snowboard, surfing and kitesurfing, sailing, kayaking, party trips, fishing and many more.
- Book your next adventure based on who else is joining the trip - join a group of people with common interests and explore the world together or traveling in a group with your friends
- Creatе your Bucket list full of dream travel destinations still not visited by you. You can easily add a desired trip by choosing in-between the ones posted on the marketplace
- Use your referral link to invite your friends to join the platform and grow your bonus network
- Earn Travel Credit from your referrals’ bookings to travel with discounts and even for free

Download and spread the word about 15toGO! Help us achieve our mission – to unite, collaborate, and explore the world with friends!

- Find people and trips that match your interests. Choose from sightseeing trips, cultural experiences, diving, hiking, ski and snowboard, surfing and kitesurfing, sailing, kayaking, party trips, fishing and many more.
- Book your next adventure based on who else is joining the trip - join a group of people with common interests and explore the world together or traveling in a group with your friends
- Creatе your Bucket list full of dream travel destinations still not visited by you. You can easily add a desired trip by choosing in-between the ones posted on the marketplace
- Use your referral link to invite your friends to join the platform and grow your bonus network
- Earn Travel Credit from your referrals’ bookings to travel with discounts and even for free

Download and spread the word about 15toGO! Help us achieve our mission – to unite, collaborate, and explore the world with friends!
summary: Match People to Travel With
recentChanges: General improvements and bug fixes.
comments: It is a very good app to match the travel buddies if we were on a solo trip. I really like this and a new concept.
Great idea. Very useful application. So easy and simple to use. The concept and design are convenient. Thanks.

Nice idea, not great execution. Matching doesn't work properly and therefore finding trip buddies is hindered. For example if I dislike someone and then like the next person, the 3rd card is again the 1st person that I disliked. This becomes an infinite loop. Can't create trips ideas for people to join in, only few agencies are promoted.

Great idea! there are times when it could be really difficult to have your friends organized for an adventure and it is awesome to be able to find other people out there who are eager to travel and explore. The app is awesome and I recomend it 100%!!! Kodos to the team who put it together!

I’ve tried other travel apps in the past but this one is by far the most advanced one! Finding other travelers with similar interests, having your own travel content, browsing through interesting tour offers - they have everything in one place!

title: Trotter Travel Planner
description:
Trotter is the world’s first travel app that brings together personalised travel tips and recommendations just for you, from the people you trust, allowing you to spend less time researching and more time doing, seeing and experiencing the things you’re interested in.

GET PERSONALISED TRAVEL TIPS YOU CAN TRUST
▸ Receive personalised travel tips from your network of friends and followers, even if they don’t use Trotter!
▸ Use Trotter’s intuitive feed to discover like-minded travellers and bookmark their travel recommendations
▸ Get tailored destination summaries from Trotter based on where you’re going and why you’re travelling
▸ Collect all the travel tips you uncover into your personalised Trip Planner

ASK FRIENDS & FOLLOWERS FOR TRAVEL ADVICE
▸ Simply reach out to your network for travel tips using Trotter’s Shoutout function and Trotter will post your Shoutout to your friends on Facebook, allowing your friends to give you tips directly
▸ You can even Shoutout to friends and followers on WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Twitter, LinkedIn, Tumblr, Kik and email
▸ All your friends and followers travel tips will automatically appear in Trotter! 

PLAN YOUR TRIP ALL IN ONE PLACE
▸ Easily create trip plans for your upcoming travels and dream ‘bucket list’ destinations
▸ Save the tips and recommendations you discover elsewhere online directly to the app, so you don’t have to revisit hundreds of travel websites
▸ Plan group trips with friends and family, allowing everyone to add their favourite tips and ideas in once place

EASILY ACCESS YOUR TRAVEL PLAN ON THE GO
▸ Store all of your favourite tips and inspiration in one place for easy access when travelling 
▸ Access your saved tips even when you’re offline!
▸ Get real-time travel information personalised to your current location

CREATE BEAUTIFUL TRAVEL GUIDES
▸ Create beautiful travel guides of your past adventures to capture and re-live those amazing memories!

SHARE YOUR TRAVEL EXPERIENCES
▸ Share your tips to Trotter’s public feed, on social media, or send them privately to fellow travellers
▸ Or share your custom travel guides with friends and followers to inspire their journeys too 

EARN POINTS & REWARDS (coming soon!)
▸ Share your experiences with like-minded travellers to earn Trotter Points
▸ Be rewarded for sharing your adventures, tips and inspiring others
▸ Redeem your points for discounted airline tickets, hotel bookings and restaurant vouchers (coming soon!)

FOLLOW & BE FOLLOWED
▸ Follow like-minded travellers and explore their adventures too
▸ Be followed by friends and other travellers
▸ Build networks. Become a travel influencer. Share your journeys and tips together on Trotter! 

DOWNLOAD FREE TODAY!
Download Trotter and start getting personalised travel tips from your network right away. It’s the only travel planning app you’ll ever need!


Note, the app uses your location to send you personalised recommendations, as well as to remember the places you have visited. These locations are collected even if the app is in the background. We recommend enabling location settings while travelling. Locations settings can be configured in the Settings app.

summary: Plan a trip, get personalised travel advice & share tips to inspire others
recentChanges:
Introducing budgets!

Now you can select your budget range when asking for tips or sharing your recommendations. You can also filter your search results to only show you posts that match your budget. We've also revamped filters so you can choose to only see certain types of posts - be it Asks (because you're a tip giving demon!) or travel guides.

Trotter makes it easier for you to get personalised recommendations that are relevant to you, from those you can trust.
comments: The app is great the tips people share are very help. Usually quick response time as well. One thing I would like to see though is some type of booking or connection to outside sources

A really great idea! A very easy way to get reccommendations for travel. Simply post your question and experienced travellers and other users will reply with their suggestions of where is best to go, what you can do while there and how much it will cost. Saves a lot of time searching. A fantastic app!

Trotter is such a great App. It has been extremely helpful when planning trips, knowing who makes the best coffee in Canberra or burgers in Boston. I feel like this app is special, it provides real recommendations by real people and I can also contribute to those requesting advice as well. Looking to start preparing for some travel next year and already getting some great advice.

Great app for all your upcoming travel needs. Recently used on a my Byron Bay trip to find the most rated mexican restaurant - Ms Margarita, and trust me, it didn't disappoint, great food and recommendation. Keep up the good work!
Great little app. It was super helpful in getting advice an recommendations for local tips. Every place I checked out didn't disappoint. It was easy to use too.

title: HOTSGO PLAN : Travel Planner & Travel Expenses
description:
Are you looking for a perfect partner app to organize travel?
Don't be worried anymore! Here is 'HOTSGO PLAN' for your trip!
Manage your travel plan and track your travel expenses easily!

1. EASY! Manage & Optimize & Find a direction
Just touch and slide your finger. You can rearrange the order, delete and add details(memo, photos, set a time). 

Oh, and! No more get stressed from thinking a perfect route. Just touch the magic wand beside each date on your plan! That magic wand optimizes your trip route perfectly! 

Do you want to know how to get there? Just push a button. We lead you to Google map right away and you don’t need to enter from where to where yourself. We did it already for you there :)
 
2. FAST! Check & Add
Check the itinerary including all Must-See-List and get information about your desire city! And Just pick a date! Then, it will be added on your own travel plan right away! The recommended itineraries are updating! 

3. Finally! Track your TRAVEL EXPENSES!
Hey, there! We got it for you, the “WALLET” to manage and track your travel expenses!! Manage your travel budget, and track your expenses during travel easily. You can add a location for each spend so you can see where you spend your money during travel at a glance! Isn’t it NEAT? and you can enter your expense on Plan menu. then the detail will be saved on your travel wallet! oh and one more thing, you can see the graph of your expenses. EASY PEASY LEMON SQUEEEZY!

4. SIMPLE! Share & Download
If you want to share your travel plan, your travel expenses or try someone else’s plan, travel budget plan, use a share code! Each plan and each travel wallet has its own code. Get a code to share and type a code to download! 

If you are travel blogger or want to share your trip itinerary and tracking your travel expenses on a community, just let them know your plan code. It’s easy!

5. SPECIAL! Download your trip itinerary as a PDF file!
You can download your itinerary which you made for your trip. You can print it out and use it when your phone battery has gone. 

Do you like write down something by hand? Then, you must like this!   

HOTSGO, we only care about your safe and enjoyable travel!
HOTSGO TRAVEL WITH YOU!

Please Love and Use 'HOTSGO PLAN'! 
Through your love and use, we can grow up faster!

developerAddress: 서울특별시 강남구 역삼로 123, 9층 스튜디오 5
recentChanges:
- Popular Hotels nearby
- Fix bugs and stabilize functions
comments: This is the most useful travel itinerary planning app I've used without all those useless extras.

Absolutely Amazing! Only been using a few minutes and I love it. It's time consuming to set up but worth it for planning a big trip. If you like to have all the info in front of you for sights you will be seeing and how to get there but want to go digital then this is the app to use. I appreciate it's free and can be used offline with the exception of planning to get to your destination because you need to be online for Google maps, oh using Google maps is another great thing about this app! I can't wait to share my trip plan when I'm done, yet another feature it has! Thanks!

Just started using this because I needed an app to plan my trip without having to book anything yet, and this is perfect! I could map out my days with or without specific timings, plan my budget, share with friends... Superb app. I only hope to be able to find more locations because there's too many specific places that I can't find probably due to them being lesser known spots. Other than that, it's perfect and I might just go pro for it.

Perfect app for all planning and travels. would be 5 star if the distances and transportation mode is able to be selected within the app so users could see at a glance the distance and transportation modes. Google should have acquired you guys to work on their Google Trips! with Google tickets, passes, flights etc. sync to the app via. Gmail would be perfect!!

very easy to use. I would love it more if we could create group or share our travel profile with partner soo they have it on their phone and can look or add whenever and see updates. Id also wish you could link website or google photos instead of screenshoting a must see and then loading it. Money input in US $ would be great. view option button nd see plans in photo version not just text

title: Safe Travel
description:
Safe Travel dibuat dan dikembangkan oleh Kementerian Luar Negeri RI. Aplikasi ini berisi informasi praktis yang diperlukan oleh warga negara Indonesia (WNI) yang akan atau sedang berada di luar negeri dengan berbagai keperluan masing-masing (wisata, studi, TKI, bisnis, dsb).

Anda dapat mengakses informasi negara tujuan Anda yang meliputi: perbedaan waktu, kondisi keamanan, hukum dan kebiasaan setempat, persyaratan keimigrasian, kesehatan, pelayanan di KBRI/KJRI/KRI, kuliner Indonesia hingga tempat ibadah.

Dengan mendaftarkan perjalanan Anda ke luar negeri melalui Safe Travel, Anda juga akan mendapatkan notifikasi berupa himbauan, saran, maupun peringatan terkait negara tempat Anda berada. 

Melalui aplikasi ini, Anda dapat mengakses informasi pelayanan yang disediakan oleh KBRI/KJRI/KRI. Anda tak perlu lagi khawatir apabila paspor Anda hilang. Ikuti petunjuk dan persyaratan dalam aplikasi untuk mendapatkan dokumen pengganti.

Safe Travel memiliki fitur DARURAT yang dapat digunakan untuk meminta pertolongan cepat dalam kondisi yang mebahayakan jiwa anda. Anda dapat mengirimkan lokasi, merekam video dan menelpon KBRI/KJRI/KRI terdekat dan melaporkan kejadian yang Anda alami.

Jangan lupa untuk membagikan momen-momen istimewa Anda ke media sosial melalui Safe Travel. Perjalanan Anda bukan hanya aman, tapi juga fun.

title: World Explorer - Travel Guide
description:
'World Explorer' is an incredible tour guide. Wherever you travel, this amazing app will spot the best places to visit, in the blink of an eye!

With over 350 000 articles (rated 0-5 stars), it's just like having a universal travel guide always in your pocket. You will discover places, monuments and museums everywhere, even next to your home! Just select any of them to open the article on Wikipedia with pictures and detailed explanations.

You can also use 'World Explorer Tour Guide' to prepare a trip wherever you go: each location is rated and can be easily localized on a map. 

An integrated search engine (in-app purchase) allows you to navigate in this huge database and provides you with complete information about any part of the world:
- All countries: USA, Canada, France ...
- All cities: New York, Chicago, Paris ...

Features: 
+ Over 350 000 rated points of interest to discover in English, 
+ Geolocation for instant info on what's nearby, 
+ Convenient search for almost everywhere in the World (in-app purchase) 
+ Units: miles and kilometers, 
+ ... and much more to discover!

Guide optimized for your phone and tablet.
